name: Full-On™ Plumping Lip Cream Gloss
about: What it is:.What it does:.What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Diisostearate, Menthone Glycerin Acetal, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Vp/Hexadecene Copolymer, Silica, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina), Octyldodecanol, Trimethylolpropane Triisostearate, Benzyl Benzoate, Flavor (Aroma), Tribehenin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Bht, Sodium Saccharin, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Retinyl Palmitate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexylene Glycol, Benzyl Alcohol, Palmitoyl Oligopeptide, Carmine (Ci 75470). (+/-): Mica, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 6 (Ci 15850), Red 7 Lake (Ci 15850), Red 33 Lake (Ci 17200), Red 30 Lake (Ci 73360), Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Wear alone or over any Buxom lip product to create the look of fuller, more voluptuous lips. .-For a fuller look, pair Full-on Lip Cream with PlumpLine Lip Liner (sold separately). Try Hot Toddy Lip Cream with PlumpLine in Hush Hush, or White Russian with PlumpLine in Stealth (each shade sold separately).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom lipglosses are so underrated.It has minty cooling tingle,doesn’t sting or burn like fenty’s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was one of my first nice lipgloss that has ‘plumping’ effect and I love it. It was decently priced, the applicator works well and I love the mint-y feeling it has on your lips. Makes me feel hot asf 🤭

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Blown away! Hydrates. Last hours. Looks like I have lip filler. Filler plump up lips. Sticky and minty but stays on through eating. So pretty . clear. Doesn’t dry out lips. Addicting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have repurchased many times over the years. It never fails me, always my go to lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Repurchased numerous times.  Love the color and consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s alright. I’m not impressed with it. I think I will return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this shade its such a perfect nude for me. You can feel your lips plumped, I feel confident speaking whenever I have this on because how it plumps. Have to reapply every hour or so.  its not ling lasting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite lip product as well as the laneige lip mask. The colour and plumping are gorgeous, and there’s only a light tingle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip product I have ever used. Love the minty feeling. It last soooo long on the lips and the texture is amazing. I want every color!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always try other plumping glasses and lipsticks but come back to this one every time. I keep this gloss in my work bag, purse and in my car. If I go out without a purse, my husband will stick it in his pocket for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my favorite lip product. it lasts most of the day like 80% even after eating and drinking. Smells amazing, light tingly sensation that is not uncomfortable like others. great color selection. I feel this is the color to go for all skin tones. I discovered this product on youtube seeing Spencer use it on his models. xoxo great for every day! thsi is the 2nd one i buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: They’ve changed the color to brighter, pinker. Used to be the perfect muted, natural-looking mauve. I wore it for 10 yrs but won’t buy Buxom lip after this last time. I will miss the texture and how long-wearing it is.

reviews.review_title: A must have lip gloss for matte makeup looks.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Ebony skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got this as a gift and it was truly stunning on me. as a dark skin girl, its really hard to find appealing lip gloss but this one was just perfect. it's not too shimmery but doesn't burn alot like other lip plumping glosses. The only downside is that the applicator is a little too small and flat for my liking. If this product gets remade with an applicator like the elf or nyx lip oils I will definitely repurchase it. 🎀💕

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lipgloss ever! I wished they offer more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color I hope it's not discontinued. It goes well with all tones of lip liners.

reviews.review_title: Dolly is a bright pink gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unlike other reviewers, I didn't feel a lot of burning or stinging.  Some, but very mild.  If there was plumping, it was very minor.  Lip gloss in general gives the illusion of fuller lips.  The color Dolly, on my light medium warm NC25 skin, is hot pink.  I wanted a more natural 'your lips but better' color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used lip plumping glosses before, but they always leave my lips feeling uncomfortable. They sting and burn! That was not the case with Buxom's Full-On Plumping Lip Cream. I saw a noticeable difference in the size of my lips, but without any burning sensation. The cream goes on smooth, and it doesn't stick to any dry patches. Also, the color was the perfect your lips, but better color. I have trouble finding colors that go with my complexion, so I was surprised when this particular lip product matched my natural lip color perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great lipgloss and it has a minty tingle to help make your lips voluminous! I also love this color it's so gorgeous on all skin tones and it's not sticky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Buxom Full-On Plumping Lip Creams. Dolly is such a great everyday Mauve shade that goes with so many different makeup looks. I also enjoy the the fact that the plumping quality to this gloss doesn’t hurt like others do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect amount of shine without the stickiness of regular lip gloss. The color is perfect and will be using again. (I was given a free sample of this)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this lip gloss was cute! It isn’t too tingly, has some good pigment. I didn’t notice too much of a plumping effect, but I did think it looked cute and the color is a nice pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss feels nice on the lips. I like the tingling feeling of plumping glosses. The color is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I got to compare it and it’s like nothing I’ve used before, it’s such a pretty color and it made my lips look very plump and glossy, I totally recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is so lovely! I loved how it applied and how glossy it looked. It wasn't sticky or tacky at all. It did make my lips feel tingly for a few seconds but it wasn't uncomfortable compared to my other lip plumbers. It did transfer over to anything my lips touched so just had to reapply after drinking after some time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was sent to me to try as a complimentary gift. The color is so lovely and subtle. I loved how it applied and how glossy it looked. It wasn't sticky at all. It did make my lip feel tingly but wasn't uncomfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is my first time ever using a plumping lip cream And I absolutely loved it. Once I applied it in Sydney, I started feeling the tingles and you could see my lips getting a bit more plump. The tingling did last a while, but nothing unbearable. I did not really like that. It was glossy effect, but it wasn’t too overbearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super plumping and moisturizing, the color was beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using a small tester version of the Full-On Plumping Lip Cream in Dolly for a while and loved it so I was super happy to receive the full sized version to test! This gloss leaves a lovely mauve pink slightly sparkly sheen on your lips and is super pretty. The only gripe I have is that it is slightly sticky and if you have longer bangs framing your face, your hair might stick to your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the shade of this, it’s a very natural flush of color. I didn’t notice a huge difference in plumping of my lips, however I love that this gloss isn’t overly sticky or uncomfortable.

reviews.review_title: Not a bad purchase worth it ! Lips so plump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, the packaging is really cute and I think I want to try other colors out soon . This lip plumper does the trick even with the tingling feeling being slightly intense the first time lol . When I looked at my lips I thought I had somehow got instantly lip fillers. Only con is it’s a little sticky so if you have long enough that’s something to consider but not a big deal .   I got the product for free in exchange for writing the review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For anyone who knows what the bunny tongue is… this is the one. The pink shade is not sheer but not opaque, it’s a nice medium that gives a pink that is not too light nor dark for my skin tone. It does tingle, but I have not noticed plumping really. It doesn’t dry my lips out anymore than an average gloss, but it isn’t hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the color and feel and tingling sensation (even tho I don't notice any plumping) but I can't believe how little product there is for $24. summer fridays lip butter balm is cheaper and comes with 3x the product ( at least ) I literally got this a week ago and I already see there's only 1/3 liquid in the tube. who can afford this?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this color is beautiful, perfect neutral color and great formula. feels great on my lips and great for a less is more makeup look:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a beauty enthusiast, I've tried my fair share of lip products. Unlike other lip gloss I've used,this one provides a stunning plumping effect without the super uncomfortable tingling sensation often associated with plumpers. The shade Dolly is a versatile mauve that complements various skin tones, making it a must-have addition to any makeup collection.  One of the standout benefits of owning this product is its long-lasting formula. Even after hours of wear, my lips remain hydrated and plump, with the color staying  vibrant throughout the day. Additionally, the creamy texture glides on effortlessly, ensuring smooth application every time.  Without a doubt, I would buy this product again and recommend it to anyone wanting to try a lip gloss with plumping lip plumping effect. It’s comfortable wear, and beautiful shade makes it a standout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these lip gloss, they are one of the best I have, the color is beautiful, the consistency is not very sticky. It blends very well and gives you a very natural pumping, and the best thing is that it doesn't itch much. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. First applying it, it was kinda heavy but settled. The color wasn’t my style. I have fair/tan neutral skintone. The “tingling” sensation felt more like my lips were really cold and it lasted until I wiped it off 10 minutes later. There was a little bit of plumping though I wish there was more, it wasn’t very noticeable. Surprisingly didn’t dry out my lips like most glosses do so that’s a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this lipgloss in exchange of review. This lipgloss is so good not too sticky ,stays on for hours and give little plumping.you can wear as everyday routine as i does. I love this product and highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a very hydrating and moisturizing lip cream gloss. I love this particular colour as it can be topped off on any lipstick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Dolly is a beautiful mauve color that's good for every day wear. I was nervous for the plumping but its only a slight tingle and I works really well! What I like most about this formula is that it STAYS lipgloss usually comes off super fast for me but this one lasts quite a while.

reviews.review_title: Staple and hyped for a reason
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program. Even though this product was sent to me I’ve had this lipgloss in the shade Dolly before. Either way I love it, it is tingly (not burning) so beware. The shade is the perfect mauve and I feel like it does plump my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how hydrating and cool it felt on the lips, I was a little scared of the tingling sensation thinking it would hurt. But it actually felt nice and refreshing. You can definitely top it off with any matte lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Full-On Plumping Lip Cream by Boxum is a nice plumping gloss. The shade Dolly is a beautiful pinky mauve shade. There is a slight tingle (which I like). The shine on the gloss makes your lips look extra juicy. I like that there is actual pigment in the gloss because I like to pair it with other glosses and a topper on my lipsticks.  Let me not forget to mention how moisturizing it is ! Would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade Dolly is a nice warm-leaning mauve that's good for every day wear. What I like most about this formula is that it STAYS. I've eaten full meals and could still feel some of the gloss on, which for a lip gloss is pretty impressive. Gives a mild tingle and gentle plumping. Nothing too aggressive. Overall a pleasant experience. I hope they come out with some cooler toned pinks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this plumping lip cream! I have the shade 'Dolly' and it's just the perfect,  soft pink for every day wear. It hydrates,  plumps and smoothes the lips. A very tolerable, mild plumping tingle that makes lips look full. It's beautiful and comfortable! I received this product in exchange for my review but my opinions are 100% my own.

reviews.review_title: A bit sticky for my liking.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item complementary in exchange for my honest review. I’ve heard a lot about these and they have met my expectations. The dolly color was a bright pink on my skin tone. I didn’t like the color on me.  me.BdHowever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for a review.  Since it was sent to me I didn't pick the color, but I ended up rally liking it.  It's a bit ore pink on me than the photos show, but I think it should be a pretty flattering color for a lot of people. The consistency is a bit stickier than I'm used to, since I don't wear a lot of lip gloss in general, but as far as lipglosses go, it's not that stick and it's pretty comfortable to wear. As far as the plumping aspect, I definitely feel a tingle when I put it on, nothing annoying, but it doesn't really do much for lip volume on me. Overall, it's a pretty color that I like to throw on when I feel like I just need a little color before leaving the house.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little nervous this would sting because I have had some weird experiences in the past with plumping products. It was a nice feeling tingle and it also felt hydrating. It is a little sticky and glossy which isn't my personal preference which is why I dropped a star.

reviews.review_title: Makes my lips plump without the sticky feeling!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After receiving this it's my go to! I can use this anytime of the day to brighten up my lips and it doesn't have the extreme minty smell most lip plumpers do. It's not sticky and leaves my lips soft and full looking! If you're debating on getting it, definitely go for it! You won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item free in exchange for my honest review. The shade is a nice natural looking shade on my lips. The product isn't sticky when applied to the lips. The tingle is almost a minty feeling. It doesn't burn like other lip plumpers I've used. But, I didn't notice a difference in lip plumpness. This is more just a cooling lip gloss, which is fine. But if you want your lips to be plump I would look somewhere else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a really nice color and has a nice light shine to it but the effect of plumping lip is not really there. It stays on for couple of hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Full-On™ Plumping Lip Cream in Dolly! The shade is a beautiful pink mauve that complements my skin tone perfectly. The formula is so smooth and creamy, making it easy to apply. Not only does it give my lips a gorgeous pop of color, but the plumping effect is fantastic. My lips look fuller and more defined without any discomfort. Plus, the subtle tingling sensation feels refreshing. It’s become a staple in my makeup routine, and I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This glass is very moisturizing and the tingling from the plumping ingredients isn't bad at all. However, it isn't really effective at being a plumping gloss. I didn't notice a difference at all. The color is nice. It's definitely a my lip color but better on me. If you're looking for a moisturizing gloss in one of the colors here, I think you'd be satisfied. If you're looking for a serious plumping gloss, I'd look elsewhere. Overall, not a bad product but not really as advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited when I received this product to sample for an honest review. There are a lot of things I like about this lip gloss. But for the intended lip plumping it's not very effective. Now for the perks, I really like the smell. It smells like marshmallows! it's very moisturizing,very glossy, and stays on for a while. The color is very close to my natural lip color just more shiny(which I appreciate). Now the cons, the biggest one is that it doesn't give a plumping effect like other glosses Ive tried. The tingling feeling is not bad. Over all a great gloss but a bad plumping gloss

reviews.review_title: Meh.. nothing to write home about
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Buxom full on plumping lip cream gloss in shade Dolly for free in exchange for my honest review as a part of the BzzAgent Buxom cosmetics campaign.  I liked the packaging. It’s chic and simple, almost with a frosted white tube. The doefoot applicator is standard average compared to other lip glosses.  The gloss itself is thick and sticky. In fact, it’s too sticky. I don’t like the texture at all. You feel the stickiness whenever you move your lips. This compares to a plumping gloss I used before in the past called Hard Candy Plumping Serum in Flower Child shade. The texture was very similar.  The plumping effect of the Dolly lip cream is fine. It tingles slightly on your lips when you put it on but it doesn’t burn or feel uncomfortable, even for me having extremely sensitive skin.  The shade Dolly is natural looking for me. I like the shade and the shine of the lip cream.  The Buxom plumping lip cream in Dolly shade does not compare to my Revolution Good Vibes Chilled Bomb Lip Oil or  all Makeup Revolution Makeup Revolution Pout Bomb Plumping Lip Gloss in Cookie shade. In my opinion, those lip glosses have a much better texture and consistency and thick, luxurious feel without the gross stickiness.  Overall, I thank BzzAgent and Buxom cosmetics for letting me participate in this campaign.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so at first I was not sure what to think of the texture of the gloss...but once it started plumping I loved it. The color looks so cute almost like natural lips but better. If you love a super plumping gloss like me, I would highly recommend this! I have reached for this product every day since I got it and will repurchase it when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite plumping lip gloss! First of all the color Dolly is perfect for summer time with the light pink. It applies on smoothly and stays on. It has a minty smell and tingling feel that feels refreshing. Especially if you need to hydrate those lips. When you take a breath you feel the coldness against your lips. If you like minty smell throughout your day this is your new gloss!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way that this formula is so different from the regular plumping glosses. Sometimes products are so similar you wonder what the difference is, but this is not the case. I love how thick this formula is, as it really stays in place and is able to last on your lips. I feel like it is a much thicker formula than the plump shot glosses, while still giving a nice plumping effect. Additionally, I think the plumping effect itself is less painful that the plump shot, so this is great for people who want a little less pain. It can be taken off, but while it is on it doesn’t try escaping your lips like other plumping glosses, and it has a much longer wear time than most. I love that this gives me a really nice flushed and glossy look to my lips. It’s a color that is natural enough for everyday use, but enough that it can also be used for glam days as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product but don’t love it. For me it is a great color choice as it’s close to my natural lip color but with more shine. I like that the tingling isn’t intense but I expected more of an intense tingle. Its sticky to me and I didn’t like that. which

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping for plumper lips, but sadly, it didn’t deliver but this could be a pro for those that aren't looking for an intense plump! The gloss felt too sticky for me, making my lips uncomfortable to move around in. It did give a nice shine and the color, Dolly, was pretty.  It lasted a good while without needing constant touch-ups. Overall, it's not a bad gloss, but it didn't quite hit the mark for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer, I received this product to test in exchange for a review.  I highly highly recommend! This was such a glossy formula and that made it incredibly flattering. I liked the Dolly color, it was bold enough to feel special, but not too bright to make it intimidating to wear for an everyday shade. The plumping worked well, I have been enjoying using this product and will purchase again when this tube runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for a review and I wanted to use it for a little while to be able to give an honest review. So I would say some perks are that this lip cream is very moisturizing. It goes on smoothly and does last for a couple hours before having to reapply, it also had a great shine to it. It doesn’t “plump” my lips though, I do already have relatively full lips so I didn’t really notice a difference with that but maybe if someone doesn’t have as full of lips, it may work for them. I do love everything else about it though. Idk if I would buy it myself honestly though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This is a very glossy product that plumps nicely. The color “Dolly” appears very pink on me. The gloss does remain sticky while wearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great plumping affect from this gloss. Gave me a just pumped look without any hassle or gross needles. Plus the color is really cute too!

reviews.review_title: MUJST USE GLOSS FOR BROWN LIPLINER
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new lip-gloss by BOXUM. I've been wearing the DOLLY lip-gloss and its the prefect shade to pair with a brown lip liner. I've used other Lip plumping products, and this one isn't to tingly compared to the two faced lip plumper. Its not to strong but you can still feel the sensation. The lip-gloss is not sticky either it glides on well while also being long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love it! the color goes with most of my lip liners and lipsticks. it’s slightly plumping but doesn’t burn, it just feels kinda cooling. it’s not super sticky either so it’s a really comfortable formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dolly is the perfect your lips but better color! The lipstick’s plumping isn’t a burning feeling but more of like a cooling sensation which I did like. It lasted while I was drinking water longer than a lot of other lip glosses I’ve tried and I was impressed by its staying power. I have very full lips as it is so I didn’t know much of a plumping effect on my own lips but I will continue to use it for the color payoff. My first photo is of my lips with nothing on them and the second photo is of the gloss only on them approx 10 mins after applying to see plumping effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is really nice and it last a long time. The shade is the perfect mauvy pink it nude.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It has the perfect gloss consistency and not sticky on the lips at all. The shade Dolly is a beautiful mauve color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color and sheen but lacks in the plumping dept! Smells good, soft and not too sticky, but I really didn’t see a lot of plump in this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m already a huge fan of buxom and I love the plumping glosses I own at least 5 different shades not including my minis! This shade I never grabbed because I thought it’d look hot pink on my skin tone but it’s perfect pink to the lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Left my lips feeling hydrated and didn’t give harsh stinging sensation as other plumping lip glosses do.

reviews.review_title: Tried and true, my go to plumping gloss 4ever <3
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've cycled through a zillion different lip plumpers, but always go back to little miss Buxom here.  Plumping details: DOES NOT STING! or burn, or anything painful. The plumping formula here gives your lips a little warm tingle that honestly feels nice and refreshing. I notice in a lot of plumping glosses that they hardly do anything for my upper lip- but with Buxom I find that it plumps that up significantly more. Overall I'm getting exactly what I want out of a plumping gloss, no pain and all gain!!  Gloss details: I'm picky about gloss finishes, don't want too sticky or too sheer and watery. I find the Buxom glosses to be exactly the formula I look for in a gloss. They are not sticky or goopy, not sheer, and actually last. This gloss is super rich and creamy, and will give you the same amount of pigment that you see in the tube. I like having a gloss with such good color payoff so if I'm in a rush, I know I don't have to layer and layer or put another lipstick under it in order to see the color.  No matter how many times I run out, I will always go back to Buxom!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipgloss! The tingling sensation is not as strong as other plumping glosses i have tried. The light wash of color makes it look more natural. I have issues with glosses/lipsticks being sticky and I didn't get that feeling with the Buxom gloss. Not as plumping as I'd like, but I have small Lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This plumping gloss is so pretty! It works right away without being too harsh. The gloss feels lightweight on my lips. I love to use this shade on my no makeup makeup days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks so smooth and glowing on my lips, it not plumbing as much as I expected but so far it looks great,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this awesome Full-On Plumping lip cream gloss and I love it because it feels good, smells really great and it does have the plumping effect. I recommend it because it’s really great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is nice! It is so shiny and not sticky. The plumping action is nice, it’s not too much and it’s not very intensely stingy. It is a nice every day gloss. The color is also good, not that pigmented though.
The lipgloss is gorgeous! The color is perfect, it stays on and doesn't smudge. I haven't noticed any plumping effect, so the tingling is unnecessary. Other than that, it's an amazing lippie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shade, there’s a slight tingly feeling but it doesn’t last that long. I feel like it plumps my lips slightly and it’s not sticky at all. It also smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This plumper starts working immediately, it doesn’t feel super stingy like i’ve felt with other lip plumpers. This made my lips look juicy & not sticky, i did choose the wrong color for my skin tone it was a bit too pink for my liking (Dolly)but i would buy again with a different color.
Love this product. It feels great on the lips and keeps them hydrated all day. The color is so cute too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lipgloss fanatic, and I’m always looking for the perfect one. This Buxom one is nearly perfect: it has a fantastic shine and it looks really good in photos. I am not crazy about the tingly feeling, but it subsides after a few moments. I would also like a lighter shade available and perhaps a sweet scent and flavor. It’s a quality lipgloss and I would buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After testing out this product I was shocked with my results. Usually I don’t like any products on my lips but now this is a must have. It does have a little tingling sensation to it but the colors are so natural and it gives your lips the thick look. I recommend to all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a diehard fan of this product. No matter how old it is it feels and smells just like it did the first time. It’s super moisturizing and never feels goopy. I adore the kiss of mint that makes a gentle tingle on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lip plumper/cream has the lips looking juicy! I picked out the shade “Dolly”. The plumping effect is a nice minty sensation which I love. I prefer glosses with a minty sensation, so this one is definitely on my fav’s list✨

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I love this color, it compliments my Asian skin tone so well for neutral makeup. The plumping aspect plumps just right not over plumped like I had an allergic reaction.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Despite how rich with color this product looks in the bottle, it goes on clear with a hint of pink. What I love most about this plumping lip cream gloss is how hydrating it’s been on my lips, it literally brings life back into my lips and it feels amazing! I haven’t noticed a drastic plumping effect, however, I do feel the cold sensation and the tingling upon application, which lasts for about an hour and a half.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You know that tingle that comes from a lip plumper? You definitely get that with this. But I think you get so much more. You get the plumper, but then you get a moisturizer AND a colorful and creamy lip gloss! Yes to more products adding peptides and Vitamin E! Also the name Dolly reminds me of Dolly Parton so it's a triple win in my book!   I do recommend this product and once they're back in stock, I'll order a few more colors! These will make great stocking stuffers too (for those who like to shop early)! I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_title: Plumps, hydrates, beautiful pigments, not sticky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Buxon lip cream gloss is my everyday, go-to lip cream gloss as you can wear it alone or ontop of a lipstick. It makes my lips look fuller, especially the top. The color is amazing and goes with everything. The formula leaves a glossy look without any sticky feeling, it tingles but no pain, and hydrates my lips. It last a good while for a lip gloss product and does not come off if I drink through my straw.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for review; I love the shade color, it’s a nice nude, a pinky color that was very flattering on my tan skin tone. The texture is good, not too sticky and tingled only a bit when applied. It left my lips nicely plump and last a good

reviews.review_title: Beautiful gloss That complements all skin tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom is one of my go-to brands when it comes to lip gloss. It has a nice frosted sleek design tube. Easy, non messy application. Perfect size for transport either in pocket or purse. Upon applying the lip gloss, I instantly noticed its moisturizing texture and tingling sensation. Beautiful neutral color that compliments any skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought this plumping lip cream was amazing. First of all the pigment in this lip gloss is absolutely gorgeous. It is the perfect color. Next moving on to the stickiness. It was a little sticky but after a while that went away fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty pigment and nice plumping effect. Not overly sticky and looks great over lip balm or actual lipstick. It gives it a very pretty and smooth shine. The tingling is nice and cool feeling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice pigment and shine.  I really liked that it lasted without being overly sticky.  The plumping was mild but nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product from BzzAgent and Buxom complimentary for review purposes. I recently tried the BUXOM Full-On™ Plumping Lip Cream in the shade Dolly, and let me tell you, it's a game-changer! The color is absolutely stunning, even better than the photos suggest. It's versatile enough for both work and a night out, which is a huge plus. What sets it apart is its gentle yet effective formula; my lips looked plumper and fuller without any uncomfortable tingling sensation. Plus, it's incredibly long-lasting, requiring minimal touch-ups throughout the day. I can confidently say I'm in love with this lip cream—it's an absolute gem!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as part of a promotion and at first did not think it would do wonders but I was amazed by this lip gloss. This lip gloss is not like any other gloss. It was a nice cream texture and does not leave that sticky effect like others but rather a full coverage that lifts up your lips and gives it the pluming effect it needs. You can wear this alone to go chic or casual and does not need any other lipstick. The best part of this lip gloss is that it is vegan and glitter free and long lasting. I highly recommend as it has different shades to choose from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was good, though I wish it had a stronger stain power; it was definitely lacking. While the initial glossiness is impressive, it unfortunately fades within an hour. There was that initial tingle upon application, but it went away in a couple of minutes. Finally, I didn’t notice any plumping effect.

reviews.review_title: One of my favourite lip cream gloss.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this plumping lip cream gloss, I use it with my nyx brown butter gloss and it comes out so pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this lip gloss - it’s a nice color, is moisturizing, and I love the fact that it tingles. The packaging is elevated as well, which is nice.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this , you’ll not stop using it… you’ll always want to use this, I love this plumbing lipstick , it’s very good. Not to spicy but effective

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! This is my 3rd one - the color is so pretty and it definitely plumps without hurting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this gloss. It has a medium tingle, its not supposed to have a full tingle. If you want a full tingle, Buxom has another product that is meant for that, but this does what it says it will. The color is cute, its kind of a light, hot Barbie pink. I usually reapply every couple hours. Not super sticky. Tingle is nice, the plump is noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this gloss. It smells amazing and looks so natural on me. The shine makes it pop and it lasts for hours. Would definitely get it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the product and it stays on for a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color is so pretty when first applied, I don’t mind the tingling feeling. After a while though I did notice that the color on my lips changed. The pretty mauve color went away & I was left with my lips looking a little red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product. The color is a perfect mauve that you could dress up or down. It has that perfect tingle that a typical lip plump has. I did feel like it went on smoothly and smoothed out lines and had the plumping effect. I do think its a tad sticky so you have to use more product and I dont love how small the applicator is. I also did not feel like it lasted super long. But otherwise it is a great beautiful color! I did receive this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Great product to add to my collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for about a week now. It takes about 15 to 20 minutes to start working, but I do feel like my lips get a little bit more plump. Usually, I have very small lips, and this lip product just gives me a little bit more confidence. Love the color too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a person with lips that have no volume or size I have a hard time finding lip products that make a difference, however this one is great.This BUXOM lip creme is a very creamy and easy to apply which allows me to stay within the lines of my lips. The color is a highly pigmented medium mauve shade that's pretty with a bit of flirty fun and sass.I love the finish of this product as it gives my lips a beautiful glistening shine without the added shimmer. After applying this product my lips appear to have actual volume,fullness and are very moisturized. I love to use this lip creme by itself as well as over other colored lip products that I have as it creates a customized color look.I will definitely be adding this product to my permanent makeup arsenal and I would highly recommend it to everyone regardless of lip size.As a person with lips that have no volume or size I have a hard time finding lip products that make a difference, however this one is great.This BUXOM lip creme is a very creamy and easy to apply which allows me to stay within the lines of my lips. The color is a highly pigmented medium mauve shade that's pretty with a bit of flirty fun and sass.I love the finish of this product as it gives my lips a beautiful glistening shine without the added shimmer. After applying this product my lips appear to have actual volume,fullness and are very moisturized. I love to use this lip creme by itself as well as over other colored lip products that I have as it creates a customized color look.I will definitely be adding this product to my permanent makeup arsenal and I would highly recommend it to everyone regardless of lip size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve completely fallen for Buxom’s Full-On Plumping Lip Cream in the shade Dolly. What sets it apart for me, compared to other lip plumpers, is the refreshing minty sensation it leaves on my lips no sting, just a cool and pleasant tingle. The color, Dolly, is stunning. It’s versatile enough to wear alone for a natural, enhanced look or layered over lipstick to add an extra dimension of shine. Love it! Cant wait for it to be back in stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the shade of this lipstick a lot. It does plump up your lips, but burns a little bit when you apply. I wouldn’t say this product is super long lasting. I would recommend it does have a really pretty shiny finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this plumping gloss! I received it for free as a part of a sampling program and it’s amazing. The color is beautiful and you feel that tingle almost immediately! Highly recommend if you’re looking for a nude plumper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this lip cream gloss!! The feeling when going on was such a creamy smooth feel; I almost wanted to keep putting more! The SMELL is to die for!! I want to eat it!! I wish there was more color variety though!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this plumping lip cream, however, I really didn't enjoy the color I received which is Dolly. It's a pretty color just not for me. Other than that, it has great longevity and it for sure hydrates my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product in the color dolly from bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. Overall, I believe this is a good product. The color is natural and looks similar to your lips, but better, and I noticed a difference in the plumpness of my lips. However, the formula is a bit sticky and doesn’t last as long as I’d like. Having said that, if these two drawbacks were addressed in an updated formula, this would be a 5-star product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried buxom’s dolly lip plumper and it’s incredible! It plumps my lips and smoothes out any lines in my lips. It’s the prettiest mauve color that compliments day or night time makeup. There is a bit of a tingle which I find is normal with any lip plumping product. I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Wasn’t super pigmented which i really like and left my lips feeling nice after putting it on. Not sticky like most glosses. Did see a little different in the plumpness of my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a pretty mauve color, I like it definitely gives a plumped lip, feels tingly on the lips, it’s not sticky goes on smooth. Love that it’s also hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s does the job, my lips feel tingly after. There isn’t much of a color though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss feels and looks great. It smells like dessert and the tingle is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the lipgloss to try out from bzzagent. I’ve been using clear lipgloss that I will definitely replace  with the plumping lip cream gloss.  It lasts for hours, even after I eat. My lips do feel bigger and the shade of pink is perfect for everyday wear or special occasions. I love it and it’s very affordable!

reviews.review_title: Definitely added to my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Product is very creamy and it is also plumping . I love the texture , color and smell. It also has a minty tingling sensation when first applied which is very mild comparing to other plumping products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample from BzzAgent, and I have to say it's not that bad :) I was expecting something really sticky, that tingles terribly, but it's actually more tolerable than other lip plumpers. The gloss gives you that nice shine, although it would probably look best over a stain or with a liner if you want it to really pop, otherwise it's fine for every day wear. It's staying in the makeup bag y'all. Thank you! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Full-On plumping lip cream by Buxom! This product is a game-changer for me. Not only does it provide a gorgeous, glossy finish, but it also gives my lips a plump, juicy look that lasts for hours. The tingling sensation is invigorating and lets me know it's working its magic. The shade range is fantastic, offering something for every occasion. I have received so many compliments on my lips since I started using this product. I highly recommend the Full-On plumping lip cream to anyone looking to enhance their pout and feel fabulous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This plumping gloss is literally amazing! It smells so delicious as well! The shade dolly is the one I had on and it was the most perfect nude shade. It stings but not to the extent where it’s unbearable. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the buxom full on plumping lip cream In the color Dolly, it’s a pretty color but when applied it’s not as pigmented and it’s more sheer. The lip cream made my lips feel minty. I love the sensation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have both in a mini and they’re ok not bad might stain your cloths and are a really good gloss not my fav but not bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this because I got it during the sale but I just don’t. Color is not pigmented enough/looks too much like my lips. The tingle/minty feeling is unpleasant and lasts for hours. Lastly it’s very sticky and my hair keeps getting stuck in it. There are a lot of lip products I like better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I try a lot of high end lip gloss. This one has great pigment to it. It’s very hydrating, and quickly became a staple. I use over the buxom balm sometimes which makes the color last forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely gloss, isnt too sticky and pairs with almost any lipliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin and pale lips but this is a great “my lips but better” shade. The slight tingling sensation also gives a slightly more pink shade to my lips. It’s a cold plumping feeling. The applicator is small and at first I didn’t like it, but then I found it was easier to be precise when applying so I ended up really liking it! It’s a sticky gloss, and was a bit stringy at first when I would talk so I didn’t love that but maybe I was just a little too heavy handed with the application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love using this plumping gloss on my clients lips and Dolly is such a pretty every day shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip cream gloss! Fresh minty feeling after applying and not too sticky of a formula. Also love how it enhances whatever lip color I wear with a hint of warm pink on top of my lipstick color. Can't wait to try the other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle seemed almost empty. After letting it sit, I held it to the light. The bottle was a third full. Is that all that comes in the bottle, or did I receive a used product???

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The hold that White Russian has on me, I swear. Packaging feels good in your hands and is simple and clean, the pigment is perfect, texture isn’t too thin or thick and sticky. It fades beautifully between reapplying and the shine from the gloss is just right. No glitter or shimmer just shine and pigment. Don’t tell RiRi but I actually like these more than Fenty’s! I’m currently into pairing the WR lip crème with Buxom’s Power Line liner in Smooth Spice. Such a pretty lip combo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so so so good. mix with a thin oily gloss if you don’t like the stickiness. i mixed with the dr dennis gross gloss and looks amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Absolute Best..been wearing for years! Mudslide is my fav..not sticky like some glosses..my staple!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my go to lip gloss for a night out. I like the slight tingle and because it’s a bit sticky it stays on longer than a typical gloss. Dolly is my favourite colour as it’s not too bold. I also like the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sick of so many incentivized reviews, so wanted to leave real ones. This makes lips appear somewhat hydrated, does not actually plump. However, after an hour of wearing it… it just felt sticky and made my lips actually feel drier. No thanks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite gloss in the world. I was so worried that Sephora wasn’t going to restock since I had bought dolly but really wanted White Russian.Both are gorgeous and last hours. If you like more of a watery gloss consistency skip this but a little stickiness helps it last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss! I have the shade Dolly and it’s the perfect neutral mauve pink color. Not too sticky, and I swear this almost has a lip stain type finish under the shiny coat because the color lasts hours.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your gloss collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been buying this for me and my sister for years because it is beautiful. The texture is not greasy and doesnt stick alot compare to other gloss. It is light weight on the lips and not to thick. Really good gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much! Definitely my go to lip gloss. The only downfall is it’s no longer sold in stores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this. The color is gorgeous and lasts! I recently tried the Too Face lip plumper and barely had any results. This is so so so much better! Warning though, this does have a fragrance! It doesn't bother me and I like the smell but I know people can have irritation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colour of this! A friend recommended it along with the Charlotte tilbury nude liner and it’s the perfect combo!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This would be a great product except for the burning tingling chemical they put in this product which destroys collagen in your lips over time. You do not need burning sensation to plump your lips when there suareare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with this colour! It plumps my lips and it's more of a creamy texture as well instead of a full gloss, which I prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite lip gloss I have ever tried! It’s very subtle plumping so you aren’t uncomfortable aswell as a great soft scent, lasts a long time and I have it in the shade and dolly and I love both!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried substituting this product for the Too Faced Lip Injection plumping gloss, and I was so disappointed. I couldn't discern any difference in lip plumping at all after using the gloss, where as with Too Faced I can feel and see the plumping formula working. It was also SUPER STICKY like 5th-grade-$1-bubble gum-lip gloss sticky.  Color was extremely subtle. Skip it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A perfect pinky nude! I love wearing this in summer time!  I have light skin with neutral undertone. As long as I do my makeup well, this gloss look very good on me. But if I'm only wearing this gloss, it could make me look a bit washed out. If you have fair skin, you would love this even more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: used to buy this all the time..they must have changed the formula but now it's so sticky and disgusting. returning this. so sad. used to love these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You can’t go wrong with these glosses. The scent is great, like a vanilla peppermint and the color is so pretty. Shiny without being sticky which I love. And the plump is subtle and not stinging.

reviews.review_title: A staple in my kit for years
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried almost every colour because I am obsessed with the formula - just the right amount of plumping, sticky enough to last quite a while but not tacky. Shade-wise, the neutral colours are the stars for sure. Dolly is my perfect your lips but better gloss, hot toddy is great, mudslide is great for my light-medium complexion. The darker tones would look gorg on deeper skin tones. The more vibrant colours are nice but since the pigments are on the sheer side, I don't find they wear the best and you have to commit to touch-ups. All this being said, I can't live without these, have gone through countless empties, and look forward to purchasing more in the future.

reviews.review_title: A nice gloss to wear on the daily!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It lasts quite a while on the lips for a gloss.  It has a nice shade to it and it's very comfortable to wear.  The only thing I don't love about it is that it isn't as creamy as I thought it would be.. but it's 100% worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have searched high and low for a lip gloss in this color range. My go-to was Marc Jacobs lip gloss in ‘Rio’.  Sadly,  since the make-up line was discontinued, my lips have been lacking color.   I saw this lilac-pink shade last week while re-stocking on mascara and got my hopes up. I received my order yesterday.  The color looks great in the tube.  When I took the wand out of the tube, I instantly saw that the color wasn’t as vibrant as the tube looked.    I applied the gloss, and was disappointed. Immediately.   It is not vibrant. The color is very translucent, almost like a clear lip gloss with a hint of pink shade to it. It is nothing like my favourite Marc Jacobs lip gloss was.   The texture is not slick, it is sticky. The tingle feature is decent, but barely noticeable.  Just disappointed all around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super amazing plumping gloss which is perfect for a dewy look. It’s light weight and has a minty feel on lips.
C’est la seule couleur que je portais de la gamme très déçu qu’elle ne fasse plus partie de la collection et non disponible en magasin égallement

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't like lip glosses and gave this one a try for its plumping effects, and I adore this product. I appreciate how it doesn't sting yet noticeably plumps my lips. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I received this as one of the free birthday perks and I didn’t know too much about it. After applying it on my lips I then noticed then tingling sensation. I was not expecting that. After reading on the website on what it’s supposed to do I guess I understood why. However, there was no type of “plumping” to my lips. Just this tingly feeling that honestly I don’t like. I would NOT recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. It looks so pretty and pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how this makes my lips look, the application is super smooth and easy and it can last the whole day. Only downside is that it’s pretty sticky so if it’s windy my hair gets caught in it and it’s pretty annoying to remove

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t live without it. My lips tend to get dry and chapstick feels weird and heavy to me. This gloss is perfect to give my lips the needed moisture and the smell isn’t offensive or too strong. Doesn’t really increase the size of your lips but does make them look moist. I love the Dolly and won’t try anything else after Buxom!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips are thinning with age but regular applications of this gloss keep them pretty and plumper!   Not a miracle worker but does wonders with beginning stages of thin lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the absolute best plumping gloss ever! It stays on, hydrates, plumps and blends very well. I usually use a lip liner, and then just lip gloss, and I can achieve a nice ombre effect. If you are on the fence, just get it! You really won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the best gloss ever. White Russian is such a Pretty shade I have three it’s my go to color and gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW, I really like this lip gloss. The color is amazing and I love the minty feeling on the lips. It’s not an uncomfortable feeling, it feels kinda good lol. Not sticky at all! Would purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss. I find it's pretty long lasting and the colour is perfect. it's a bit sticky but I find that all long-lasting glosses tend to be. I have this in a couple colours and they are all great. my lips tend to dry out when wearing some glosses particularly plumping ones but that's not the case with this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the product was very very pigmented and had a beautiful shade. the packaging is also super cute and with a good chapstick it stays on for a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got Hot Toddy - Toasty Nude. I even paired it with Buxom lip liner after reading a few other reviews. Honestly, I don't give much credence to plumpers. It's not like I have Angelina Jolie lips or anything, but they're naturally pretty OK so I'm not too concerned about beefing them up. But I was interested in a really nice nude gloss and went with this one because I liked the color and if the plumping actually did work, well rad - gravy.  Unfortunately, the color is way off -- MUCH pinker than a nude should be (and definitely more than pictured). It basically looks like I'm wearing a soft, pastel pink. I expected something a little more on the beigier end (it looks much more beige than pink in the product photos). If I had to match the actual results, it looks more like Dolly than the Hot Toddy images.   As far as the plumping goes, absolutely no difference (as expected).   This is an absolute waste of money, I'm not happy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best plumping gloss I’ve used to date and this colour is very flattering.  I’ve purchased this 4-5 times now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite lip plumping gloss! Sometimes I just shade my lips with a brown lip liner and apply this on top and it looks so good! Very happy with this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it… it makes my lips feel refreshed lol. This was not my first purchase but after I purchased the first two, I just had to go back when I ran out. Trust me, you won’t regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
