reviews.review_title: Does not plump and is horribly sticky!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awful, just awful. While I am certainly no expert with glosses like these, I have used a couple and they werent nearly as sticky gross as this one. The color is ok, subtle which I wanted, but it feels like my lips have glue on them, really icky sticky! And as far as the plumping claims, nada, didnt do a thing and didnt hardly tingle or anything. I do not recommend at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like cotton candy! love it! It gets tingly and feels cool on the lips, but I enjoy it. It's not painful or too much. The color is very subtle and pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always a 5 star rating for this lip gloss. Colour goes on nicely and last for a good amount of time. Perfect shine and no bleeding.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product out of spite because I was really trying to find a plumping gloss I have many allergies especially to peanuts, nuts and the ingredients list didn’t include that so I was HYPED!!! I’ve seen many reviews saying the last time is horrible but personally this will keeps my lips tingling for at LEAST 2 hours because I noticed how well it was plumping and I don’t have no lips I can see the difference, and because it’s a cream it will last longer it will be sticky if you apply to much but this is SUCH a good gloss because no one wants to waste $30 on something that will not work so i’m hope my review will help with anyones concerns! all love <3
Why did the price of the product go up $2? A 10% price increase seems exponential

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty on the lips, moisturizing, and gives my lips a soft and smooth appearance. However, I get zero plump in my lips with this… it definitely does not deserve the title of a plumping gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this not to make my lips bigger(they’re already too big), but in hopes it would smooth out the lines. I put on carmex first, then this. I have to say that I like this better than I thought I would. I was scared the color would be too dark or be mulberry(which I hate) but the color was PERFECT against my natural lip color and skin color. The color looks like its natural. I didnt want something too bold or too sheer. The color was perfect.  Now for the “plumping” effect? Not too sure. Again, I did not buy this for bigger lips. I do not want bigger lips. I already heavily moisturize my lips constantly. If you go some time without moving your lips(talking or eating), your lips will smooth out on its own(like when you wake up in the morning). I put this on as a part of my full face makeup before work and since I rarely need to talk at work, there have been days where my lips do look very plump and seamless. On days where my lips move a little more, they look the same. But the color and sheen of the lip cream make my lips look better regardless.    Honestly, all a lip plumping lipgloss can do is pump your lips out to its natural capacity. It wont do anything extra. If you have super thin lips, dont expect this to do anything drastic. It has a nice formula but thats it. This was also my first time ever using a lip plumping product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to spend this much money on a lipgloss but after going through two samples very quickly I knew I loved it and it would be worth it. The shade white russian is just so beautiful and natural, and it really does make my lips look fuller. I don’t find this gloss sticky and when it “wears off” it doesn’t leave a mess (or dried up lips). Love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have used the Buxom glosses for years and Dolly is a great neutral, universally flattering color.  The lip plumping tingle is nice and not overly intense like some other brands, feels good on the lips, and a lovely color. Only reason I didn't give four stars is just because I wish the color would last longer but it's a gloss so not really expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolutely favorite plumper. I use this as a gloss most days, and the peachy color looks great on a red lipstick (my favorite!), a pink, or a nude. The plumping effect is immediate, and the tingling sensation is pleasant and not too intense. An absolute staple of my beauty routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended by someone as part of a make up lesson. Loved it! Subtle plumping and colour - already ordered another shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color is fine, but definitely not for wearing on date night with your spouse - my husband avoided me any time I wore this gloss. It has a great smell but the stickiness was a definite turn off, and even in a slight breeze my hair was stuck to my lips. The only plus was that it doesn't wear long - LOL.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a few of Buxoms lip glosses and I think they’re underrated. They have good color payoff, nice applicator and it lasts quite a bit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these glosses. They're not as painful as other plumping glosses & last for hours. This shade with CT Iconic Nude lip liner is so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not very impressed. I had high expectations for it but it did not live up to the hype, at least for me. I did like the kir royale color but the formula is sticky and it had no plumping effect for me. I’ve use the grande brand lip plumper and that one worked, but not this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Purchased this from the sale and glad I didn’t pay full price. No plumping effect but worse of all this was sooo tacky and sticky! Definitely returning

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Colour is very similar to my natural lips, is shiny without being sticky and is easily layered with other lip products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good!!! My new favorite lipgloss. The color is nice, not too bright but still fun. And it definitely plumps!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best hands down, I never wear lip gloss because I have sensitive lips and most glosses are sticky and drying. Not this. Love the colour and the smell (isn't artificial smelling). The mint and mild tingle is perfect! 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got two shades: Hot Toddy and Moscow Mule. This is truly a nice product, good consistency, long-lasting, nice cooling sensation, modest but appreciable plumping effect.  My only complaint is the colour— Moscow Mule is a decent enough match to the pictured shade, if a touch lighter, but Hot Toddy isn’t even close! It’s a rose nude with nothing toasty about it.  Pretty shade but do avoid if you’re longing as I am for a warm nude plumping gloss. Lawless forget the filler in George almost gets there despite being more mauve than advertised. The Lawless gloss is thicker, doesn’t feel as good on and isn’t as long-lasting as Buxom but it is more effective as a plumper. I own both and would honestly repurchase both. I just wish companies would get it together and take accurate swatch photos—no reason they shouldn’t be dead-on on a phone screen..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it . The plumping definitely works :) definitely recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this gloss for quite some time. It plumps a little and has a nice texture. It is just a nice daily gloss. If you want more plumping there are others products out there to do that. The colors are nice also.

reviews.review_title: Sangria: A Must Have For Bold Red Lip Lovers
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Good: The Buxom formula provides a wonderful plumping effect, a light-medium pigmentation pay off and a minty effect. These are my go-to lip gloss formula and I use them as both topper and as stand-alone products. It's rare that I leave the house without wearing one of their colors on my lips. The color Sangria is the perfect color for those who love to rock a red lip. Whenever I wear a red liquid lipstick I usually top it off with some Sangria, not only does this add an extra oomph shine/plump to the lip it also provides a hydrating effect which can be much needed when using a liquid lippie. This color is perfect that it matches just about any red especially blue based reds, it certainly does not take away from any color I've used it with. I cannot imagine my red bold lip routine without topping it with this color, it's truly a god send and I always get complimented when I wear a red lip because of this. The best part, unlike other toppers this does not make my red liquid lippie bleed which is a god send. I will never stop repurchasing this product in this color, so perfect.   The Bad: As stated, color pay off on this is not highly pigmented. If you're looking for a super bold stand-alone red lip gloss, this is probably not it but it's still quite beautiful. Use alone this ranges from a very light red to a punky bold pink depending on how it's applied.   The Ugly/Honest: Pricey, but worth it.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous Plum-Mauve Color Suited For Any Event
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Good: This is a wonderful formula that provides a medium level of pain-free plumping. The scent on this is the classic minty that Buxom is known for and it does leave a lightly minty feeling on the lips, in an enjoyable and pleasant type-of-way. I truly love this gloss, the consistency is not too thick or too running and the color smooths out very nicely yet can also be built up or worn as a topper. This is hands down the most versatile lip gloss on the market. This particular color French Martini is a wonderful mauvey-plum that packs a bit of a bold kick without being too out there for casual events or even the work place. It's truly stunning and I love wearing this under my mauvey liquid lippies and even bullet lipsticks. It's very rare that I don't wear a BUXOM gloss on my lips before leaving the house. Could not recommend more.   The Bad: The pigmentation on these is quite subtle and although I prefer that and it's ability to be buildable but also work as a topper, I can acknowledge that not everyone wants that kind of finish in a gloss.    The Ugly/Honest: The price point for these is quite hefty which means if you're a color collector (like myself) you'll end up shelling out a pretty penny for these. Once you own one, you're likely going to buy another (and another, and another). Proceed with caution. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Good: I love BUXOM plumping lip creams/glosses and am very familiar with their formula. This is a pain-free plumping stunning gloss that delivers a beautiful luscious glow on the lips. I own them in almost every color that BUXOM has released and I don't plan on stopping. This truly is my all time favorite lip gloss. The formula scent is a bit minty and it also feels quite minty while on the lips, if that is not your sort of thing-these glosses may not be your favorite. I almost always use these glosses as a topper regardless of what lip stick I'm using and I also use them alone a good portion of the time. The colors always blend out nicely on the lips and aren't overly saturated with pigment so if you're looking for an intensely pigmented lip gloss-this might also not be for you. But for myself, this is perfect and serves amazingly as a gloss AND a topper because it does not take away from the other lippie I wear underneath and always adds something to it instead. This gloss always adds a slight but naturally beautiful plumping effect without being painful on the lips, which I really appreciate. Aside from the amazing formulation, the color Hot Toddy in particular is the perfect nude for my fair/light skin. It's not too intense, too dark, too light-it's truly the perfect nude and my go-to everyday lippie when I need a subdued color but also want my lips to look/feel amazing. Hot Toddy is the perfect shade for the office or to a business-type-of-event.   The Bad: Some people will not enjoy the subdued pigmentation on this lip gloss, I love it but I can see why some people would not after shelling out ~$20 on a gloss.   The Ugly/Honest: Despite being gorgeous glosses, these are quite expensive but in my honest opinion very worth their price point due to their amazing performance. I will continue to buy these in every color I think will suit me :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly the most long wearing plumping gloss I’ve tried

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this gloss and I've been using it for years - about 8!! The color is perfect and works on a bunch of skin tones. The plumping agent isn't painful or uncomfortable and the scent is very faint. I will continue to buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite lipglosses. It’s actually minty and lasts a while. I love this in the summer because I feel like it actually cools me down. I’ve tried it in dolly and Clair and I love both of them. A must have. I think I like it more than the Dior lip maximizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip gloss!  Comfortable tingle with the plumping affect, nice peachy tint, and smells like pina coladas!  Very mildly sticky but better than most glosses I’ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 this is the best lip gloss there is. Dolly is the perfect everyday “your lips, but better” shade (for my light, olive-toned skin). It ticks all of the boxes for the perfect lip product, with great lasting strength, color, & hydration.   The formula has really impressive lasting strength, up there with lipsticks. Plus, it does an amazing job of smoothing the texture of my lips. It gives a noticeable amount of beautiful shine, without any particles are glitter. It’s also perfectly hydrating, without being a gloopy/sticky mess. I went through 2 minis, before picking up a full-size. The mini-size lasted me months & months of daily wear, so the full-size will most likely last me a year.   The “plumping” effect isn’t what you would normally associate with a lipgloss. Most “plumping” glosses only make your lips look fuller using a “tingling” effect. With this gloss, it’s more in the impressive smoothing + hydrating aspect. It really does plump your lips, and make them appear full (opposed to pepper or whatever is normally in them).    The only thing I would consider a negative is the taste. If you accidentally lick your lips, it doesn’t have a very pleasant taste. Personally, I don’t mind it. It’s not gross, but it definitely doesn’t taste good. The scent, however, is pretty neutral.   One more thing to note is that I find this version (Lip Cream Gloss) isn’t tried as often as the Lip Polish Gloss. If you’re choosing between the two, I definitely recommend picking this version up first. So far, Dolly is the only shade I have tried (because I’m obsessed), but I plan on picking up Hot Toddy, Mudslide, Rose Julep, & Moscow Mule.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of your best products.  I have used this for years and I keep coming back for more!  It makes my lips full and I love the nutreal color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful everyday lipgloss. It’s non sticky but does have a cooling affect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smell. Smells sweet like either cotton candy or cookies. Didn't really notice any plumping nor stinging/tingling, but I do get that minty sensation. I would compare it to getting toothpaste on your lips or a bit more intense than a Burt's bee chapstick. I got both Dolly and Mudslide and both very natural. Dolly is more sheer. Mudslide has more pink to it but still very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I have so many and will never stop repurchasing. They are not drying and have such pretty colors!!! Must buy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loveeee this color and lipgloss!! i originally got the mini one in a set and i fell in love with this color. my only problem with this is not a lot of lipgloss comes out at a time. the mini had so much more come out on the applicator but i still love it!! it also has a great plumper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Very icy feeling wich I don’t rlly like and it’s a little peachier in the bottle wich I don’t mind because it looks more natural! I wouldn’t repurchase it because of the price but I definitely love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip gloss/plumper. I bought it because my friend was wearing it and her lips looked awesome and now every time I wear it I have people asking about what it is. Seriously this product is a game changer.

reviews.review_text: The girls aren’t doing it like Buxom. I’ve been using this lipgloss for years and will never stop! As someone who has tried every lipgloss on the market, I can confidently say this is the BEST lipgloss out there PERIOD. Looks amazing on women with darker skin! A must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to daily/going out lip gloss. I have been using it for years. It gives a sexy fuller lip. Love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite lip gloss ever. This shade White Russian is the perfect muted nude shade. I feel and see the best results in terms of smoothness and fullness when using this gloss. I would absolutely recommend this product and shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Can’t live without this lip gloss. I LOVE IT SO MUCH I USE IT EVERYDAY.

reviews.review_title: Buy it. You'll have no regrets.

reviews.review_title: the best cream lip gloss ever

reviews.review_title: Color is good and feeling is so cool

After I used it I find my lips are not too dry like before and when I use it, the product make my lips feel cool, like mint on my lips, it’s really fantastic feeling for me! I love it very much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: J'aime beaucoup le produit! il est hydratant et agréable à porter sur les lèvres. très bon gloss

reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss! I think It makes my lips “look” fuller because it seems to smooth out any wrinkles.  It’s not too sticky but a little. With a mask on or not, it doesn’t stay on that long and I need to reapply but I still love it and will rebuy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this product, hydrates my lips and makes them look great! This colour is the perfect shade for me. Love it,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ok I’m comparing this to citi lips which I love! I don’t know if it’s something about when pigment is added but no matter what plumper I try I seem to always feel like the clear one is the best. Never the less this was good. Plump lasts a few hours. You can still feel a tingle after forgetting you have it on. Perfect shade of pink!

reviews.review_title: I wanted to love it but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t know this lip gloss would tingle so much and really the entire duration it’s on your lips. Couldn’t get over that plus my husband complained about it after we kissed. For the plumping effect, I already have really thick lips so I couldn’t really tell if it did anything. The color and thickness of the gloss was beautiful though. If I needed “plumping” then maybe it would be worth it, idk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I expected a bit of a burn with this lip plumping gloss & I didn’t even get that! It was so thick my lips looked as though they had been glued together.

reviews.review_title: Cult favorite - hot toddy is IT!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite lipstick/gloss/plumper EVER. I am known to buy countless amounts of beauty products and this by far is the one that I go back for every time. Hot toddy is the most gorgeous color and the scent is to die for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favorite.  Perfect beigy pink color and amazing formula.  I have one with me all the time.  Please don't change anything about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go to nuetral plumping lip!  This color actually gives your lips a real tint of Nude....  This color is all u need for your lips. No pencil necessary.... Highly, highly recommend I promise you'll ♡love♡ it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!  First let me say, most plumping products don’t really work. Sure, you can get injections or vacuum your lips using those new devices, but lip plumping gloss and lipsticks won’t work the same way, so if you’re expecting those kinds of results, this product isn’t for you.  For the rest of us, it’s delightful! I guess I’m strange in that I never enjoyed the matte lipstick trend, and missed the days of shiny gloss with sheer colour. This stuff is incredible! Sheer, nice shine, not too much glitter / shimmer, and doesn’t bleed! Well worth every penny. 10/10 will buy again.

reviews.review_title: Best Lip gloss I've ever tried.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After getting this brand in a trail set I decided I needed to try a full size.  I was very hesitant to spend this amount on lip gloss but believe me when I say this product is well worth the money. It's absolutely amazing. I adore the shade Dolly and the plumping properties of is are just hands down the best. Unlike some I've tried in the past that can be overwhelming this brand seems to have it's balance just right in the formula. Top notch product and I don't need to purchase all that often because it lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very tactile, so it is very important to me how something looks, feels, smells, and tastes. The Buxom lip glosses are amazing! There is a bit of stickiness to it, but not so much that it bothers me, and that makes it extra glossy. The colors are sheer, which I love for everyday use. I'll definitely continue to add this to my regular purchases!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THESE GLOSSES! Sooo gorgeous and not too sticky! Honestly I think this is a must have (I own White Russian and dolly in these glosses). There is a tingle on your lips but it doesn’t stay for too long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip gloss/lipstick I own. I have purchased every shade that is made but the wine color. White Russian, Lavender Cosmo is my two favs. I carry both shades in my purse. These make my lips feel pulp and no lip-liner needed. Dolly is pretty, it has some glitter effects more so than the others. You can't go wrong with any shade of the Buxom. I was hooked from a couple of years ago when Buxom sold a set of five in a mini set. Please see my profile or follow me on Sephora for my honest reviews. I pay full price for the items I use, I am not apart of any influence's. My reviews is from a true shopaholic and honest to my ability.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: No other lip gloss compares to the slight tingly plump, beautiful color tones and payoff, and tinting of your lip of this gloss.  I love the tingle and it’s plumps your lips just enough to where it doesn’t look ridiculous.  Colors are great! I have both Kir Royale and Hot Toddy. Kir Royale is the perfect pop of berry/plum that’s not too purple. Hot Toddy is a perfect nude on me.  It leaves a stain on your lips, which I love!!! This allows it to fade more gracefully and the color looks nice even if you need to reapply gloss.   Beware. It is on the sticky side, but I think this adds to it’s staying power! I hate glosses that fade in an hour and you haven’t even eaten or drunken anything... this won’t!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love all of the buxom glosses, so creamy and smooth, dolly is a perfect color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I have been using it for 2 years.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using primarily this gloss daily for 2 years.  It is a great product, and easy to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. It works. My lips are thinning with age and it's a great alternative to getting fillers. My lips have always been on the thin side so this does the job nicely. Just a little enhancement

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I chose Mudslide and expected a bit more depth to the colour. It’s more of a gloss than a cream. Nice tingling effect and it does feel as though it “plumps.” Long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is gorgeous and super moisturizing! I dont give it a perfect rating because the gloss doesn’t last very long. After half an hour I need to reapply it (and this is without food or drink).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this lip gloss! It is fresh and tingly when you first apply and plumps your lips within minutes. I also love how smoothly it applies and how it leaves a tint of color on your lips even when it has worn off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love all of the Buxom lip glosses and was excited to try this one! It is a beautiful colour that matches with everything. It is perfect to apply over top of a matte lip pencil/lip stick. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my favorite lip gloss ever, loving the smell and the color is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: J'aime énormément la couleur et il fait très bien son travaille de repulpant

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect colour, nice shine, not sticky. I used to avoid wearing lip gloss now I can’t wait to wear it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Buxom lip glosses - the lip plumping make your lips feel cool and tingly. Also there are so many color choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Makes lips look and feel fuller. Not to sticky of Consistency. Lasts a good amount of time per wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVORITE lip gloss ever. It stays on for awhile and truly does plump your lips to make them look fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying that I don't wear lip color.  I've always had an aversion to it, because of how my mom's lipstick used to smell growing up, ha!  Also, I just don't like the feeling of something on my lips (even chapstick bugs me).  But, I do love the look of a nice gloss and how it finishes a look.  I used to buy MAC lipglass, and was never a fan of the texture.  They're slimy, sticky, leave a film after you've been wearing it awhile (mixed with saliva I guess, and just looks yuck), and the colors were a bit heavy/pigmented for me.  I recently found NARS, and was happy with it for just special occasions because the color was nice and soft, and wasn't as sticky as MAC.  I still never reached for it unless I had to.  Fast forward to recently.  I was browsing Sephora's site, and saw the many great reviews for this gloss.  Figured, why not.  I was at a store last weekend, and got the White Russian color.  Tried it on when I got home, and whattttt!  Not only did I love the color, but after wearing it for an hour, it just got better!  The White Russian color is perfect if you're not wanting pigment, but just want something soft to tone down your lips and just give that extra natural shine.  It's perfect if you do smokey eyes.  I have generally full lips (they're not wide, but they are medium sized but the top and bottom lips are full).  So, I was not looking specifically for something that plumps, but I will say, these give a teeny tiny plump that just makes your own lips look smoother and 'healthier'.  I don't notice a change in size or fullness that is noticeable to others.  The texture is sticky (to me), but it doesn't leave a film at all.  The tingle is refreshing!  It doesn't sting at all, but rather, just feels minty.  The minty feeling lasts around 20 minutes or so.  I've never loved a lip gloss (or anything lip product related), as much as I love this!  So much so, that I even like wearing it in the house!  Definitely give this a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This buxom gloss works wonders! Its the perfect formula- not too thick or sticky! Love the colour, a bit more pinker than i thought but i still really love it. This and the dior lip glow gloss are the only glosses that actually plump up my lips! Feels super comfortable and lightweight, can’t wait to try more colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom products are the only commercially available plumpers that actually work for me. I’ve tried dozens and this one makes a difference!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this plumping lip cream gloss. My lips appear instantly fuller and more smooth. The color Kir Royale is the perfect match for my complexion. Even though I'm at home most days it is my daily pick me up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss. I wouldn't say it's the most plumping, it does not give a tingly feeling but has a nice minty taste/smell that I love. With a light color change of your lips, not as aggressive as a lipstick but a color change.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I looove the texture , love the color and the smell, i give it a 4/5 stars because it does not last that long, but it gives a very good glossy look plus it gives a spicy scent at first

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased my first Buxom Full-on Plumping Lip Cream Gloss in Hot Toddy - toasty nude based on the reviews I read here on Sephora website.  I would say that this product really works.  First off, I have never been conscious about how my lips look like until I had my most recent Gum tissue graft.  Being on liquid diet for 7 weeks when you're not great at hydrating in the first place made me realize just how my lips looked so dry that my lips looked older than my age!  This made my look at Sephora website and searched for lip products that will help my lips recuperate and look healthier.  I tried this Buxom plumping lip gloss and this paid off.  My lips really looked a lot healthier and a lot more hydrated.  From now on, I will be using this product more often in addition to hydrating a lot more!

reviews.review_title: Great plumping! Prep lips before applying!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favorite lipglosses! The only downside is that it is very tacky and sticky and if your lips are in any way chapped you will be able to feel the texture of it. So make sure to clean and wipes your lips smooth before applying! Other than that it’s plumping effect is great, and so are the color options!

reviews.review_title: I slept on this for YEARS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You know those products you always hear about but just shrug them off, assuming they’re over-hyped? That’s what this was for me until I finally tried it and wowww I’m IN LOVE. It’s the perfect nude color, it plumps up your lips, and honestly idk I just always look & FEEL better when I wear it! I’m glad I finally tried it but mad at myself for ignoring it for so long!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss ever! It has the perfect hint of red, I think it’s the best summer gloss ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff soo much!! I’ve tried quite a few lip glosses including the Dior and too faced, I always go back to this one. I’m a fan of the White Russian and the pink champagne. Doesn’t tingle your lips, just kinda feels like you’ve put a fresh piece of gum in your mouth. Lasts quite a while too. This is a staple for me. I only wear lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss definitely plumps my lips and delivers a long lasting shine and subtle colour that is not too sticky. My fave glosses in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I read great reviews about this product so I decided to try it out. I am extremely impressed. The colour is not overpowering and the gloss adds a little extra shine to your lips. The burning sensation is minuscule and realistically, if you are using a lip plumper you have to expect some sort of feeling on your lips. You will have to reapply the product throughout the day, but it is worth it because it looks great!

reviews.review_title: Hot Toddy - this colour is so nice and neutral !!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been a fan of  buxom  for 2 years now and theres nothing disappointing about their glosses!!! their plumping lip creams are not even painful, and you notice the difference right when you apply it ! Its not as sticky as other glosses ive dealt with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best color for us brown skin girls. It lasts, isn’t super sticky, and I love the slight tingling sensation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This color is off from what you see online which is why I gave it a 4 star rating. It’s more like a light pink, not a nude. It feels a little minty on the lips, which I actually like, but I don’t see any plumping, which is most likely due to the fact that I already have plump lips. It applies smoothly and leaves your lips super glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find this soooo pretty and feels great on the lips. Definitely recommend

reviews.review_title: Bad color sample and test sample on skin image
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this gloss but this color was so far off it was ridiculous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour! It looks like a bright vibrant pink/purple on the  website but in person is a darker (but still sheer) plum colour. I have light skin and it's very wearable, and the minty feeling is nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect in every way possible! Beautiful on its own, but I love how it looks over mat lipsticks. Perfect pink nude. Gives you the tingle effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love all of Buxom’s glosses. Hot Toddy is the fav for summer. Just enough color. Perfect on ALL skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: FAVORITE LIPGLOSS EVER- the Moscow mule is such a perfect nude for me! I am a tan caramel and it gives it the perfect tint with great shine. I use it all the time, all year long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this in Moscow Mule and a mini in Kir Royale that I will definitely replace with a full size when it's gone. Moscow Mule is a nude caramel shade that's perfect for every day especially in the summer. Kir Royale is a burgandy color and one of my absolute favorites that I think would be flattering on anyone. These are classic translucent glosses with a slight tingly feel and just tacky enough to stay on a long time without being a sticky mess. I have tons of lippies but aside from some tinted balms I reach for these the most. Keeps my lips moisturized all day and doesn't need to be reapplied every 10 minutes. Cant wait to try a few other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved this line because it lasts for days (lol). My lips never get dry... I'm not sure about the plumping effect.  I have never bought them for that effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all Time favorite gloss. The color is a very natural gloss. Plumps my lips and makes my lips look bigger!  if you don't like sticky, this may not be for you,  because when product is layered can create sticky consistancy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss! The colour is perfectly mauve. When you first apply it, the colour seems to condense in the creases of your lips. After about 5 minutes, it disperses as your lips start to plump. I have naturally large lips, but this make them look more plump. For those with smaller lips, I would definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my third tube and I love it. Goes on smooth and isn’t sticky, little tingly from the mint but I enjoy that personally. It has nice pigment but you can still use as a lip topper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. It gives you a natural beautiful color and it feels so nice, I highly recommend this gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Buxom products to begin with but I wasn't certain about this colour - the colour I wanted was sold out.   The product goes on smooth, I don't find it tacky or sticky (death knell for any product if I find it tacky or sticky), it stays on for quite a bit  -even through drinking a coffee.  The color is a nice soft pink and gives just a hint of colour.  It would be very suitable alone or as a topper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had bought this product a few months ago and I love it! I would definitely purchase again, i find its not sticky like you'd fine with most glosses, it also gives your lips a nice little plump along with being quite hydrating. its also a nice gloss to go over any colour lipstick giving it a nice shimmer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t plump my lips at all. two faced Lip injection gloss works better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the Buxom lip glosses in variety of colors over the years and still keep coming back! The plumping is real - I instantly feel a tingling in my lips and a fuller look. The colors have never disappointed and it leaves a great shine. I’m giving it 4 stars as opposed to 5 because it does not last long - I find myself reapplying often and quickly going through the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is thick and has an overwhelming minty scent and cooling feeling. I didn't notice any plumping but it does make your lips look glass-like and shiny. I have fairly pigmented lips so this color didn't really stand out on me. For the price, I think I would skip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: J'adore la crème à lèvres de Buxom. La senstion du repulpant ne chauffe pas, elle donne plus une sensation de fraîcheur comme la menthe. Les couleur sont délicates et donne un effet naturel. Je recommande fortement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour was pretty but absolutely no change to my lips. It was a big disappointment.

reviews.review_title: Always on the hunt for THE lip plumper!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am always on the hunt for THE lip plumper! This one smells really nice, sweet, like birthday cake. It is smooth and of medium thick consistency. There is a mint-like sensation, that is nice and light. This one does not burn, which is a plus! The high shine gives the appearance of fuller lips. if you choose one with color/pigment be aware that it will go around your lip line and you will need to wipe it off! As far as plumping goes it smooths out some of the natural lip lines and leaves my lips with a little bit of plump.... but still not enough for me! I gave it 4 stars because it is a good lip gloss but I am still looking for THE plumper!

reviews.review_title: Make sure your lips are hydrated!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color (kir royale). It is a pretty deep hue, with a blue base which is great for fair skin. I love how my lips plump with the buxom gloss, but make sure your lips are super hydrated before or else it highlight every crack/flake. Layerin the gloss over a Lipliner definitely helps it stay longer. I have tried it with the Sephora lip liner to go in deep ruby, which seems to be a good pairing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss. Love the stinging cooling effect of Buxom lip glosses. I’m trying this new color. At first I thought it was too dark but after it settles I love it. I find it has an orangy burnt undertone. Don’t get me wrong this is very nude, neutral shade. For reference I tried White Russian, Pink Lady and Dolly. Will keep buying this shade. And with the Sephora VIB sale 20% off its awesome!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color, and love how long it stays. But it doesn't plump your lips at all. Just tingles like mad, feels like the numbing stuff dentists use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible!!! does not work at all, all it does is add shine to your lips!!! No plumping whats so ever! wish i could have a refund

reviews.review_title: i own two at a time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: my first review because this product is truly the best. this is the best nude gloss for brown/indian lips. i wear it everyday bc i actually love this product so much and it is so versatile

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Perfect amount of color, and feels great. Conditions and tingles and isn’t sticky. Matches everything. I don’t like lipstick, and chapstick isn’t enough. Most glosses wear off too quickly and feel slimy. I have a hard time paying this much for a lip gloss, but I have since bought another one and also the mini 4 pack. Awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss ever! Highly recommend! I got a travel size one and loved that one so bought a full size. I wouldn’t normally spend $20 for a lip gloss but this one is definitely worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this hoping for a nice full plump lip.  The color is a perfect everyday shade. Gloss is a bit thick but I still love it.  It looks perfect when you when want something subtle.  Just wish there was a little more of a plump.

reviews.review_title: Gloss is nice, but not plumping
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss itself is nice. It moistures since my lip didn't get dry and it is creamy. I give a 2 stars because it doesn't plump. Also, I didn't found the colors pigmented enough like Dior gloss perhaps (specially since my lips are more purple ish then rose) If you want a plump effect, go with the Too faced lip injection (the normal one). It's the best one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the cream glosses from buxom. The shade I purchased is my perfect nude pink and matches my lip color very nicely. At first I wasn't sure about the plumping feeling as I hadn't had one of these glosses in a while, but after using it a few times I got used to it and I just love this. It's my go to gloss at the moment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this on a whim while waiting in the checkout line. So glad I did. This is my favorite gloss now. I have bought in several shades because it’s that good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if it necessarily plumps my lips but I do love the colour and consistency!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The kir royale is quite a dark shade so I usually use it in the place of lipstick. The lipgloss is plumping and long lasting. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For sure my favorite lip gloss. It’s long lasting and plumping and this color is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product for my fair skinned face. I use this every time I have an audition because it makes my lips look smooth and shiny (but not too shiny). 4 stars because it's not a clean beauty product and it's pretty sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip plumper! I prefer this over the Too Faced Lip Injection. Such a cute shade that goes with any skin type. It lasts all day long and gives the effect of fuller lips with not such a strong tingly feeling. The gloss lasts so long and is not super sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are beautiful, although very sheer. Nice minty scent and lasts a reasonable amout of time. Not drying at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've purchased three of these in the same colour, hot toddy and always use them completely up. This product is long lasting, the colour is the perfect nude for me, and the plumping effect is great, my boyfriend asks if I've had my lips done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good product.  A good gloss.  Glossy effect.  Superb color.  He just repulses a little.  I would have liked a more pronounced effect.  Bon produit. Un bon gloss. Effet lustré. Couleur superbe. Il repulte juste un peu. J'aurais aimé un effet plus prononcé.

reviews.review_title: Amazing lipgloss but it leaks from under the lid:(
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this lipgloss, BUT - it leaks out from under the lid which sucks if you keep it in a nice handbag.  I originally thought it was just because I was using the tester product, so I bought the full size one, but same issue.  So disappointing.  I keep a tissue around the lid now so it doesn't stain my purse.  As much as I love the gloss, I won't purchase again because of this issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not impressed. The slight tingle is pleasant but the plumping is non-existent. I regret not sticking with Too Faced for a plumping product. The texture on Buxom is smooth but slightly tacky and as it dries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite lip gloss ever! And that's saying something coming from a lip gloss addict. It lightly plumps my lips and has a cooling sensation. I love that its not glittery but very high shine. It looks perfect by itself or as a topper to a lipstick. Every time I run out I repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color so much! You can mix it with different colored liners for different looks! And it smells amaaaazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss so much!! It works so well and is so pretty!!!

reviews.review_title: The best color for An everyday Lip gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss. It’s the perfect texture and definitely does give my lips a pouty look. The color is perfect for everyday use. Love it... just wish it was not always sold out!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally.  Sultry Mauve is my go-to color and the plumping action always feels good.  Not a huge fan of lipstick so this cream gloss is perfect for the woman who doesn't wear a lot of make up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the tingle. Gorgeous neutral color, non drying and lasts long. My 3rd Buxom,  I think I'm getting addicted!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this and Dior Addict to compare.  I actually like the BUXOM better.  I now have four different colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In comparison to the top faced lip injection, I would choose this one. First, I liked the shade on it was pink and suttle with a minty smell. I didn’t find my lips to really look more plump but I didn’t mind the overall look. If you are looking for a major plump difference I’d avoid this but I did like the gloss look and shade

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. Has just a hint of colour and is very moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually love Buxom lip glosses but this color was more of a white that just doesn't look good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love Buxom glosses. They give a perfect plumping effect and the color is perfect. Hot Toddy and White Russian are my favorite for a natural look. I will continue to rebuy this as long as they make them. Also they have an exfoliating effect after each wear my lips are soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently picked one of these up on sale and I forgot why I ever stopped using these! They are so good! My favorite shades are White Russian which gives you that light, milky glossy finish and Dolly which is a little darker and more mauve-toned. I love the way they feel on the lips, slightly tingly and moisturizing and I think they last decently long for a gloss. Most days I'll just go in w a MAC lip liner and one of these on top and call it a day! Such nice lip glosses, they have been best sellers for so long for a reason, Highly Recommend !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would buy one of these in every color if I could. I love how it plumps without itching or burning or causing pain. It’s just a nice tingle. Plus every shade TURNS OUT — the color you’re seeing is the color you’re getting. Great payoff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this lip glows in White Russian. I’ve purchased it many times and will continue to do so. You get a slight tingle nothing overwhelming and the color is perfect for everyday.

reviews.review_title: Bought it 2 times and will probably repurchase!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This coloured gloss is REALLY nice. Not overly glossy nor sticky. The color is AMAZING. It is my to-go lip product when I want to add a pop of colour to my lips. Just finished my second tube and will probably repurchase in the near future. My only downpoint is that the lip gloss is quite expensive (for a student at least)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip gloss. Nothing comparable. It is a repurchase for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful gloss! stunning color, smells great (like cake!), cooling, minty feeling, and definitely gives the illusion of fuller lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is a very pretty dainty light pink colour. It is not too sticky and I like how it feels on my lips. However, I wouldn’t say that it is very plumping, I don’t find it tingly at all, it is more of a cooling sensation. Which is still nice.

reviews.review_title: Great if you love plumping lip gloss!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a big fan of plumping lip gloss, this is for you! The colour is fantastic, too. I find it a bit intense on the lips and sometimes more of a bother than a benefit. I also find it gets a gross buildup if you are reapplying throughout the day. Otherwise it does the job!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip plumper is great!!! It doesn’t burn or irritate your lips and gives it a cooling/minty feeling which I like. It’s a bit pricey, but other than that, it’s a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this gloss. This is the second colour I've bought and I honestly cannot get enough. I am NOT a gloss person but the colour payoff and the feel of these are unbeatable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After getting a set of minis of this gloss last year, I've become addicted to Buxom. I'll never be without a tube in my purse at all times

reviews.review_title: My absolute Holy Grail lip glosses!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely am addicted to Buxom's glosses. They are cooking, plumping, lasting, and look great over all my lipsticks or liners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I notice a subtle plumping effect with this gloss. It feels cooling on the lips - no burning like you get with regular plumpers. The colour is beautiful too. It’s not too sticky, very comfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty! Takes about half an hour for the full, plumping effect and colour is very nice!! Definitely feels really moisturizing and it’s not burning, just a soothing tingling :) Will be buying again when I run out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a lovely color and it makes my lips look very full. My only issue is the fact that it rubs off very easily and I find myself constantly reapplying it throughout the day. Despite that, it’s definitely worth trying out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail!!! The shade hot toddy looks SO good on someone with a medium skin tone. Recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss costed me $30 and I have to say that it did not make my lips look that much fuller... I really enjoyed the cold/tingly texture I received when applying it, as well as the colour, but this does not make my lips bigger... disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my play subscription box and its amazing. it's so pretty & plumps my lips so well. I love this gloss that I will be getting other colors. plus it looks so good on top of lipsticks too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom glosses are my favorite and White Russian is one of my favorite shades. It is creamy with just the right amount of shine and tingle. It looks great alone or layered on top of a nude lipstick. I have used it for years and will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_title: BEWARE Once you buy it you wont go back.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im very light skinned and i like my lips to basically almost match my skin. This on top of my lip stick la creme mystical lip angel tears is like the perfect match. provides a nice pale glossy look that i didnt even know i liked until i bought this xD

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lipgloss I’ve ever worn! I have 5 tubes in different shades and they’re absolutely amazing. The only lipgloss I truly enjoy wearing. It plumps my lips and I don’t have to reapply for hours. Best purchase ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss! This color is basically my MLBB (My Lips But Better) because I have very pale pink lips, but I have also enjoyed fun shades such as Princess in the past. I think that I've only ever finished one tube because there is just so much in each one! I usually lose them before I finish them. All in all, I think that this product is definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This color is so beautiful and would easily compliment any skintone. It's great by itself or as a topper. You can definitely feel it pump pump pumping you up. I only bought it for the color,  the plumping was a bonus.  I felt it all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful gloss. Not to sticky has a soft tingling effect but nothing to overbearing. Definitely will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff!  It makes your lips tingle as it plumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love love these. Tingles for a long time. Perfect neutral color Dolly is beautiful as well as the more pigmented Kir Royal. Best I have ever tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this lipgloss 10 stars if I could! I probably have at least 150 lipglosses in my my makeup room. This is by far, my go-to favorite lipgloss ever. It’s plumping but not painful, very glossy and lasts for hours. I have dry lips and this helps a ton! The best part for me is that they have colors for a more toned down, make look AND dark, sexy shades for a night out! My favorite color is Dolly. I feel like it’s both a day and night color. 10/10 would HIGHLY recommend.

reviews.review_title: Wear alone or perfect addition on top of lipstick
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Every Boxom color I've owned has been gorgeous. I love this gloss! It stays on much longer than regular glosses too, and while it plumps, it doesn't sting. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss looks good on it’s own and is quite pigmented, wich I absolutely love. However, the formula isn’t long-lasting and I need to reapply often because the product is SO sticky. Plus, I haven’t seen a difference when it comes to plumping my lips. I won’t repurchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipgloss! The color is the perfect nude with a touch of pink. It goes great with my skin tones and stays on for a long time. I love how it feels on my lip and the fact that it stays put.

reviews.review_title: Buxom is the Queen of Lip Glosses
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was first introduced to Buxom's Full-on Plumping Lip Cream Gloss circa 2008, and I have been a loyal customer ever since. I have extremely dry lips and this formula has stayed constant for the past 12 years. I love the cooling and tingling/hydrating feeling you get. Thank you Buxom for making a great quality product. Yes, a million times over I would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favourite lipglosses! I’m truly obsessed with lip gloss and have had many really nice glosses: YSL, Marc Jacobs, Chanel, etc. My 2 favourites are Buxom and Dior Lip Maximizer! Buxom has a large shade range, is relatively opaque, feels comfortable on the lips, and is not even remotely drying! Def a must buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this plumping gloss. The colours are endless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate sticky, tacky lip gloss, but I LOVE the texture of these (it's sort of still like a gloss but somehow less gross). Pretty good staying power for a gloss-like product, with good color payoff. I liked it so much that I bought other colors (ex: Kir Royale is a nice bitten color). These are just so easy...swipe and go! You also get the slight tingle...sort of a minty cool tingle, not a lip-venom-type-burn. I don't think these are particularly plumping in the physical sense (they aren't going to inflame your lips), but the glossy finish creates the illusion that your lips are *slightly* fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the nude/lighter Buxom glosses and I wasn't sure how the bolder colors would look. This red pleasently surprised me! It's very pigmented and has the same scent and plumpness of all the other glosses I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time fave gloss, wish that it would last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A slight tingling on the lips to explosive, polished gloss. I've received numerous compliments

reviews.review_title: Mudslide is a natural pretty pink
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love Buxom lipglosses. I enjoy the minty tingling, it’s not too strong, the shine is great and this shade Mudslide is such a nice natural, “your lips but better” shade. Feels moisturizing on too. Great for those days you want Look pretty and natural with minimal makeup on. Will definitely re-purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s beautiful pink color And it does make my lips look fuller. Too pricy though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the colour and the long lasting gloss . It gives tingling feeling and I loved how my lips were never chapped since I use this when I go out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use Dolly which for my skin tone just gives my lips a muted pink gloss. I love the plumping tingle, too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST lip gloss EVER. I go through this stuff like somebody on crack. LOL. It’s smooth, and simply makes your lips beautiful. Worth every cent.

reviews.review_title: Wore it on my wedding day <3
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore White Russian over my NARS lipstick in Dolce Vita for my wedding and I absolutely loved the combo. The vanilla scent is soft and the plumping, tingling sensation it gives is nothing too intense. I adore this product during hot summers especially because I find the it quite cooling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss ever. I'm super pale so this shade is perfect for me. I like that it's not too sheer so it actually has pigmentation to it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these lip creams. I have this product in several different shades and the are awesome. The product goes on smooth and isn’t sticky. The mint extract does a great job plumping lips and adds a nice scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite lip gloss brand. I have many of the colours and usually use them to the very very last drop! In addition to this colour my other favourites are “sangria” and “rose julep”!!  I usually wear over a lip liner (lip cheat by Charlotte tilbury or buxoms). The lip liner keep the edge very crisp. I like the cool tingling and the plump from Thai gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lipgloss you'll ever try! I can't get over how much I love this. The color is stunning and the formula is perfection. Smooths over the lips evenly, tingles just enough, and lasts a good amount of time. It feels so good on the lips... I can't recommend this enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Color was much darker (orangey-brown) than I expected.  But still love these Buxom plumping glosses.  Have several and will buy other colors again .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love Buxom Lip Gloss! Non-sticky and long-wearing. Although I don't think there's much plumping, I do enjoy the feel and scent of the formula. Does not add color to the lips but delivers great shine!

reviews.review_title: Packaging needs a redesign because it leaks!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product but hate the packaging! Does anyone else notice that the gloss leaks slightly from the top even when I tighten it? This is my 2nd tube and both had this problem. With such a dark color, I’m afraid to just throw it in my purse because it leaks onto everything in my bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip gloss ever. Often imitated, never duplicated. Both the colour and moisture last a long time for a gloss I buy this over and over again and am never without at least one in my purse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this luscious gloss! I love the tingling sensation and the way it makes my lips plump and I'm 51 years old! I need this stuff!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss, stays on, great colors. Not too heavy, I always go back to this gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color! I don’t usually gravitate towards pinks because I feel it accentuates any yellowing of the teeth. But this color is light enough and subtle enough that I can feel confident wearing it. Love the “coolness” it leaves. But as for plumping, I don’t notice any. I also wish it lasted longer on the lips but that would probably result in a more tacky feeling. So overall, I’m happy!

reviews.review_title: Hot Toddy is the Perfect Color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hot Toddy is the absolute perfect color for a lipgloss. I've never fell in love with a lip color more than this one. It's perfect as a natural lip-colored (but slightly rosier) gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color in the tube, but it's so sheer it practically blends in with my natural lip color and basically just evens it out.  I don't think the minty menthol sensation does anything for plumping the lips. I noticed no discernible change in how plump my lips looked. The plumping effect comes primarily from the ultra glossy shine this gives - which is lovely - but far too sticky and thick.   In the end, unless you're dying for that menthol feeling on the lips, I think a cheaper gloss could do the same thing. I'll be returning this because I can't justify the price for meager color payoff, overly thick stickiness, and zero plumping effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favourite lipgloss! I have it in white russian, dolly, kir royal, mudslide, pink champagne and blushing margarita. I never leave the house without one! It is so moisturizing and gives the best tingles on my lips! You won't regret buying one so get it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don't let the description word nude scare you away from this amazing lip gloss. This color is not too light for me and is fantastic over other colors. This formula is minty on me until I remove the product or until it wears off. It lasts for hours. I was surprised because it is a gloss. This one also smells like sugar cookies and tastes good. I liked this enough from a Play! box that I went out and bought more Buxom glosses. Highly recommend this formula and this color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color!! I normally like my lip gloss to be almost the same color as my lips which this is(shade:dolly). Its very nice and glossy :) it’s hard for me to find lip gloss that I like and last. (It’s not lipstick so I don’t expect it to last hours on my lips!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was loyal to Dior’s lip plumping gloss...but then I received a sample of this in Hot Toddy. Wow! So much more color and what I really like is that it doesn’t get all sticky and discolored at the bottom of the tube. I also like that there a lot more color offerings. Hot Toddy is a beautiful dark nude, but I also own White Russian which is a very pale pink, Bellini which is a peachy pink, and pink champagne...which is my favorite. It’s a nice milky pink. Not too light, not too dark. I love this product and can’t wait to try more colors! Oh and it plumps. Even after I take it off for the day, my lips look plumper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually use lip gloss but decided to try this because my lips have been looking pale and dry lately. So far so good- a like the smells, the tingles and the look of the gloss (not too shiny) and the color, Moscow mule, is amazing for my light/medium warm undertone skin. Like my lip color but... more! One issue is it's pretty sticky but that's to be expected from this type of product.
