reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Not super sticky or drying. Plumping. Tingling but no burning. Smells nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss! My lips feel so nice when I use it. And I do; all day long while at work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is beautiful! I found this product while waiting in the checkout line. After purchasing it, I applied it that night. There was fresh sensation going on, I was confused. I researched the product and that’s when I found out it has ingredients to help your lips look fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this product. I’ve purchased multiple times now and recommend it to all my friends. It makes my lips look SO good. It plumps without the burn like many other plumpers have. It does have a cooling tingle feel at first but I like it. The Dolly color is the perfect hint of color without being too much. I find the gloss effect lasts me for hours and it doesn’t dry out my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THESE! My favorite is the White Russian nude. The perfect gloss that does some plumping. The plumping isn’t the kind that burns and makes your lips tingle and hurt. Just a nice minty light tingle. Not glittery just a great shine to the lips! I need more!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: pink champagne is perfect light pink color and my favorite go to, it doesn’t take much to add on and it lasts for a long period of time. You can sip water or a beverage. Though if your plan on eating a sandwich or a hotdog, forget it. I love that it gives a minty feel on the lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this, it tingles on your lips but I am okay with that. I love the colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of this product and had to purchase a full size. I'm typically not a lip gloss person but there's something about this plumping gloss that got me hooked. It does feel a little sticky and thick but I loved how it made my lips looked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Luv this product.  The lip care I usually buy is no longer available so I had to find a new one.  My lips are often dry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't do a great deal of plumping but you still can tell that there is a difference, the color is definitely lighter/nuder than I expected but I'm still very happy with the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A waste of money.  Unpleasantly sticky and no results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the tingle, LOVE the color. Love how my lips appear Fuller is volume. Absolutely love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far the best plumping lip gloss and most affordable!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of my all time favourite lip glosses. only giving it 4 stars tho because it is $28 for a lip gloss which is obviously slightly steep

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had about 5 of the lighter, less pigmented colours and like them all. The formulation is not sticky, does seem to plump a bit, is minty and feels great. Stays on decently for a gloss too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am the type that finds lip gloss too much of a commitment.  I like the look, but in reality, drives me nuts.  But this gloss is now in my daily routine.   It stays on well, it lasts a long time.  It only has a slight grit, and is not sticky.  It doesn’t smear, my lipstick stays on.  First lip gloss I have ever actually liked!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm usually a Rosebud Salve girl, no matter the occasion (unless I'm paying for event makeup). I decided to branch out a little and try this in peach daiquiri for a nice neutral shade...and I love it! Not too sticky, not too shiny, and maybe a little tingle but nothing crazy. About to go for a *slightly* more colorful shade for some gala events I have coming up. I'm glad I took the leap!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I swear I wear Buxom's lip gloss every day! I have so many different shades and I love them all!!! Go ahead and try it, you'll love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I applied it on the lipsticks with textures or colors I don't like and it makes my lips look so juicy and elegant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this Hot Toddy shade. Pairs well with my 020 Dior skin tone. I got this in my play box, and will repurchase after using up my Dior Lip Addict. I like this better. It has a nice tingle and I feel my lips look plumper, and any areas where I tend to feather are filled in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is fantastic! I have fair skin and I love both Rose Julep and Mudslide—I wear one of the two practically every day (I rotate between them whenever I feel like it).  It applies easily, isn’t sticky, and looks awesome. When you apply it, it feels a little tingly—not uncomfortably—and I think it does make my lips look a bit bigger (not drastically, but hey, I’ll take it!).   These are my new go-to lipglosses—I love them so much. Even just applying this lipgloss on its own without any other makeup makes a huge difference in my appearance. It looks natural enough that I don’t even need to look in the mirror if I’m short on time and want to apply it.  It also lasts a good while without being hard to remove if you accidentally apply it beyond your lips (lol I’ve had other lipglosses stain that area before!).  I love this lipgloss so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite gloss! I love the slight tingle, it smells nice, isn’t sticky, and the color ‘Dolly’ goes with everything. I don’t know if it actually makes my lips fuller, but I love it regardless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am one of those women who dont like to feel like I have makeup on.  This feels that way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a great texture, shine, and color to it. It tingles, wew, it tingles.  But looks great. It will dry out and then start to cake up when you reapply. I had to reapply several times in the day because it doesn't stay on very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: So in love with this product! I am at a loss for words. I am a full on “daytime” kinda gal when it comes to makeup—I have very light skin, so when it comes to lip product, I am always stumped—the colour is either too light for me or too dark for me. I found this product on my little adventure and knew it was the one for me. Lip plumping products have always been one of my main essentials, but this one, this product is a delight. It’s not light and it’s not dark—it’s just perfect. I highly recommend Buxom, not only because of their amazing quality, but because of the results as well.

reviews.review_title: Natural look, not glittery, can use for “adulting”
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tingly, glossy, not sticky, not glittery, and looks ALMOST like a naturally flushed lip - I’m a bigger fan of this cream gloss vs any of their other lip products and I have a lot of them! Love the tingle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss and it is my favorite gloss ever. It smells so amazing and it has a nice consistency, not too thick. It plumps the lips nicely. You can't expect to have lips that look like they are injected but this definitely gives them a nice shine and plump. Absolutely love it and definitely recommend. I bought both the rosy color and the light pink color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: POLLUTES THE ENVIRONMENT BY SELLING A TUBE THAT IS ALMOST EMPTY WHEN YOU BUY IT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this lip gloss/plumper. It smells great and lasts long. I love the tingly feeling. Such a natural look too(:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product in White Russian.  I hate wearing lipstick but I can’t get enough of this gloss.  It’s a little sticky but not enough to stop me wearing it.  I find myself checking out my lips all the time now.  Lol! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Repurchased many times. Best nude gloss ever and has a nice gentle plumping feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this lip gloss!!! BEST one out there. colour is just sheer enough but not super thick

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great gloss!! I always repurchase it, deff worth the money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Simple and long-lasting. I love the tingling when it is applied to the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a wonderful color and feels fresh going on. It does not really plump your lips, though; nothing will do that, unless  you want to get injections. However if you want a nice, long lasting lip gloss, this is a good one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample in my Play box and will be purchasing the full version. I have the Hot Toddy color and I am in LOVE. I usually shy away from lip glosses but this one is a keeper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My impression of this product is probably influenced a lot by the fact that the shade I have (White Russian) isn't the most flattering on me, but as far as formula goes, I wasn't overly impressed. I'm not a fan of the cooling sensation this has on the lips. I find it a little uncomfortable. I also think it's a bit sticky. Overall, not super impressed, and for $21, I don't think it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My go-to gloss! I love the tingly sensation I get after applying, plus the smell is amazing. Definitely plumps the lips and gives you the your lips, but better look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip gloss. Tingling feeling took a bit of getting used to. Color is beautiful. Not too sticky and not too sheer. Wears well. However, I have very sensitive and dry lips. After wearing ONLY this lipgloss for several days/week (??) - it’s gorgeous! I love it! Works well with any color palette! My lips DID start to have some irritation and peel/blister a bit. After a couple of days using a different, plain lip balm, all is good and ready for another round!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so sad!! The color of this gloss is beautiful, the texture isn’t sticky at all, it looks so shiny on the lips! BUT it hurts my lips so bad. It’s not a tingle, it burns. I wish so badly that brands would make glosses that aren’t “plumping” because I’d love to wear this one but the pain does not go away, it only gets worse the longer you wear it. Such a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite. Love the tint of pink it gives me. And I love the tingly feeling upon application. I usually get bored with lip glosses and move on to another brand. However this is one of my staples. I’ve bought this many times. Love the way it feels. Hate how the price increased a smidge lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love. I get so many compliments on this lip gloss. It plumps just enough to notice but not so much that it’s uncomfortable. I also love the formula’s consistency because it’s not too sticky but it doesn’t go away after 20 minutes like other lip glosses I’ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this gloss. Plumps my lips and makes them look smooth. And it is not sticky at all! The slight tint also gives a my lips but better kinda vibe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is super moisturizing. I have really chapped lips and this is the only product that seems to soften them. I also love the color mudslide as it is quite natural looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss right now. Not too much plump just a little tingle. Lasts for awhile before having to reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful.  Beautiful colour, beautiful texture, I really like this lip cream/gloss.  I’m not really into lip gloss as it’s too inconvenient for me and not that comfortable but when I saw that this was somewhere between a lip cream and a lip gloss, I was curious about it.  I do not regret this purchase at all.  My lips look so luscious and kissable when I wear it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: addicted addicted addicted where is the collar Ella? no longer available? i can't live without this....

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite color and lipgloss. I hope they never discontinue it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hydrating and not too sticky. Pretty color and just the right amount of spicy.

reviews.review_title: Not Enough Pigment, Minty, Not Plumping.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did I buy expired goods in my local Sephora? That is hard to believe. Maybe these were damaged in heat, during delivery.These glosses did not plump up my lips like the Va Va Voom Liquid lipstick formula, by Buxom. This had no color on lips. Only color showed  in the tube. This gloss has a heavier feel. It is called a lip polish. It is not super oily. Only one mettalic color shows on me, as a light tint, named Gabby. That's a berry wine. The pinks do not show up on me. If you love minty, cooling polish to hydrate, but not oily, then this is for you. I personally like some color to show, and stay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this makes my lips look. It’s my go to gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My lips look gorgeous and sexy everyone loved my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is awesome! It feels tingly when I put it on, and the colour is so pretty..however not a large portion for the price! A little bit disappointed ; also, my lips do not look too much bigger than usual, just a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Can’t really tell a difference with my lips but this is the only lipstick I’ve tried that’s moisturizing and stays on for more than four hours which is nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best lip gloss! I love everything about it - the consistency, taste and effect. Mudslide is a neutral pink and really just accentuates your natural color. Plumping is slight but effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS LIP GLOSS!!!!!! I normally do not wear lip gloss but I have incorporated this into my day-to-night makeup routine and, honey, my lip gloss be poppin'. It's a head-turner for sure! Plump and glossy lips w/out the annoying glitter or tawdry OTP frost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Plumping and and stay beautiful throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite go-to gloss in Dolly and Rose Julep.  I’ve tried lots of other glosses, but keep returning to this one.  Love the intense tingle and plumping - and the gloss is creamy without being sticky.  My holy grail lip product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: a perfect everyday lipgloss, goes with every look and is very light weight, even if you dislike the polish formula you will love this gloss! the only downside is that each time i order one the shade tends to be slightly different but all pretty! am on my 3rd in less  than a year!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lipgloss I've used - worth the $$ and works with so many lipstick shades and even on its own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: came with my monthly box. can't say I wear lip gloss often but it's a great color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A high shine gloss with a mlbb (my lips but better) finish. Perfect for no makeup makeup days. Gloss is a plumping gloss so has a slight pepperminty tingle but I don't find it bothersome

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE This Gloss. I got it in my monthly play box and I'll probably buy the real product. The gloss is the perfect amount of sticky and smooth. It lasts for longer than a normal gloss and it does a good plumping job. I LOVE IT!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss went on smooth not sticky, excellent pigment was just right and my lips felt refreshed. I love this product and will want to buy it once I run out. it's a favorite i keep in my pocket.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS!!!! Got it in my PLAY! By Sephora August box. At the beginning, thought I will never use this gloss and the color is not going to work for me! BUT when I tried it, I just loved it! Looking forward to buy the full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample in Play! I wouldn't buy a plumping gloss because my lips are naturally pretty full, so I was pleasantly surprised by how much I love this gloss. I definitely will buy it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do not like lipglosses but I received this in Play and I actually like it especially with lipstick underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly the best lip gloss I’ve ever used. Beautiful color & long lasting. I constantly get compliments every time I wear this gloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many lip glosses, but this is by far my favorite!  I don’t wear lipstick, but love a glossy nude and this is my holy grail!  It’s not sticky and last a long time!

reviews.review_title: Good for the appearance of fuller lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Dolly is a perfect, slightly pigmented mauve gloss that layers great of matte lipstick. I overline my lips slightly with Huda and then put this gloss on top. It makes my lips look naturally fuller. It also has a tingle to it but if you accidentally taste it, it’s not very pleasant. Lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving this lip gloss. It feels smooth and not tacky. This color adds a healthy glow to my lips and refreshes my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect, cooling feeling all day, natural finish, and this colour really compliments my warm but light olivey complextion.  It is not as pink as in that photo either.  I also have White Russian but as I am almost out I decided to try something different as fall is coming and this colour too is a knockout!  Smells delicious, feels great and lasts long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the cool tingly feeling from this lip gloss!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss provides the perfect touch of color, makes lips feel super hydrated and soft. It smells like vanilla and has a cool, minty feel. And when the gloss eventually fades, the color fades perfectly with it. Hot Toddy is the perfect non-pink shade...like a very muted coral. And Dolly is the perfect pink. Everyone needs this gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula throws me off. It’s hard to put on. Super thick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tingly...yes. Plumping...no. Not glossy? Definitely is glossy. Sticky? Annoyingly so. As advertised? Absolutely not. This is a shiny non matte lipgloss that poses as plumping by adding camphor or menthol to give the cooling sensation to fool the consumer into thinking it is doing something. It says not shiny and is definitely glossy. It says not sticky and I would have less goop on my lips if I rubbed a lollipop on them. Not impressed. I can buy the same crap for a dollar at the dollar store and have my hair stuck to my lips and my boyfriend not want to kiss me because I am sticky and his lips burn afterwards for a lot less money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is awesome! Yes it’s sticky but it has to. Smells nice and it gives nice plump and moisturizing. Dont waste your time for your lips during your makeup. Use this and save your time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love buxom. It's mildly plumping and the Moscow Mule color looks so 90s on me - exactly what I was looking for. It has great staying power for a gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip gloss I've ever bought!  I first received a small sample in my Boxycharm subscription.  It plumps the lips and leaves a cooling minty type of sensation on the lips.  My friend noticed it the other day, said What do you have on your lips, that's really pretty, then of course I recommended it to her.  I think they have a wide variety of shades and I can't wait to try more of them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in my Sephora play! I absolutely loveee ittt! I am now a fan of this brand and am planning to buy more in the future! I love tingly stuff so I love how long the cooking effect last although to me my lips look the same but the long lasting of the cooling effect overrides that for me! Highly recommend! Can’t wait to try other colors!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So I just received this in my Play! By Sephora subscription box in the color Toddy and it’s definitely plumping, but not the to point where your lips look huge, so I feel like it’s perfect for me. The lip color looks very natural. I wouldn’t say it’s sticky like some of the other reviewers say, but what it is does do it makes your lips feel like they’re burning on fire or if you had hot peppers on your lips. The tingle doesn’t go away. If you can handle that, it’s fine, but otherwise, it’s kind of a turn-off if you have really sensitive skin or lips because it does produce a very intense feeling. It does smell amazing though, but it’s not something you would want to either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with this gloss!! I am not a gloss wearer, not since I had kiddos. I got this in my Sephora Play box this month and have absolutely fallen in love. The Hot Toddy color is a perfect nude color for my fair skin and the slight tingle is fantastic! This is a high shine gloss with zero stickiness! I will be purchasing more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in my Sephora play box. While I liked the tingling and plumping effect, it had a weird taste when I licked my lips. Color was pretty but I would probably pick a different shade if buying myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lip cream gloss in this month’s Sephora Play Box. It smells like cotton candy, tingles like peppermint, and wears very nicely. There’s no shimmer or glitter, just high shine gloss with this, and I love it! It’s midway between sheer and opaque...buildable by itself, and layers over lipliner and lipsticks beautifully. It’s not tacky or sticky but stays on for quite awhile. The plumping formula really works, too. I’m in my mid-40’s, and my lips look like they did in my teens - plump and smooth. I need to get me some more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy Grail!!! Love this lip gloss so much, great texture and perfect nude color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: nice sheer shade, works nicely. not sticky which I love in a gloss. didnt notice too much plumping bit it certainly tingled for awhile!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing color if you’re looking for something to give your lips just a little something. The tingle is not intense at all. I received a mini in my Play box. Best lip product I’ve personally ever received in one. ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best lipgloss I've gotten from Sephora. I keep running through them like crazy because I love them so much. They last so long. Hot Toddy shade is perfect for me but also do love White Russian.

Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Perfect color to have on hand. Moisturizes while giving a subtle color.

reviews.review_text: Great for basic lip plumping. Nice shine and feels!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I picked this based on the good reviews and a sales associate also recommended it, very nice sheer colour with shine, minty feel, also smells super!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so again I got this while I bought multiple lipstick collection. Loved it so much had to buy again. It feels so fresh on the lips. My only problem with it is it gets sticky after a bit. I bought the big one and I know it's going to last a while. But would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my favourite everyday gloss. Its not sticky, i always get compliments, and its so MINTY and makes my lips feel fresh without the pain that comes with most lip plumpers. I cant wait to get more colours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I live this item. This is my second one in a diff shade. I love the colour. Love the minty feeling!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Long lasting, beautiful colour, and I love the tingling effect.

reviews.review_title: Once I had this, all the others didn’t matter.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m on my third tube of this and I love it. When I have it, I don’t use any other products. I didn’t buy it as a plumper, but more so as a gloss. It doesn’t have that oily feel other glosses leave, it makes my lips feel really cool and soothes them. I always get compliments when I wear this, too. I bought it in White Russian and it has a natural look to it. It tastes amazing, too. (Just don’t eat it.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now I'm a woman that has tried many many glosses over the years and I can honestly say this one's the best. Most glosses make my lips peel, leave a weird white line or feel sticky. This one does none of that and I stead leaves my lips shining, smooth and poppin'. I'm on my third bottle and loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this lip gloss!! It is plumping and has a minty/tingle sensation. Its not sticky and comfortable to wear. Looks fantastic over a liquid lip and is long wearing.

reviews.review_title: THE BEST COLOR AND LIP PLUMPER
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I forgot about this old standby until watching YouTube video. Just as great as ever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color, compliments every time I wear it. Perfect slick not sticky feeling. I love the Buxom full on plumping lip gloss line this is my 4th or 5th color and probably my favorite so far. Using Buxom lip gloss for about 2 years now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

The product has a slight tingle to it that I find enjoyable.  It does not stick to my hair in windy weather.  I have very long, baby fine hair so this was the test for me.  It lasts for hours.

reviews.review_text: One of my favourite lipglosses. Gives a beautiful wash of colour and subtle plumping effect. Rose Julep shade is perfection.

reviews.review_text: I already have pretty big lips so I’ve never bought a plumper, plus I hate the tingling feeling. However I got this is a multi kit and fell in LOVE. The colour Dolly is the perfect natural pink/nude and the plump is for real! I always get asked where I get my lips done! The tingle isn’t that bad plus it’s cooling on a hot day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this colour! I've received so many compliments that many friends are now using this lip cream. It's the perfect nude gloss. It looks great on its own for an understated yet polished look, but pairs beautifully with lipstick to give it a bit more depth. I always keep one in my purse for touch-ups. The creams used to tingle and make my lips looks significantly large, but I don't see any plumping effects anymore. Only downside for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a weird Buxom gloss in the past that had a spatula as an applicator and I just didn’t like the product. I went back and tried Blushing Margarita and Hot Toddy and was absolutely floored at how beautiful the product made my lips looked. Plush, plump, slight cooling tingle, colors are your lips but better. Not gloppy, not too sticky, talkeable, smell is heavenly. Will be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE! So fresh, light, beautiful and non sticky! My lips feel so refreshed and healthy every time i apply it and the tints of color make it all the more beautiful! Also had it in White Russian and it was the same result- excellent!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula. Lasting. Gives the illusion that your lips are plumping without any work done. Smells great. I have three diff shades

reviews.review_text: Smells good. Easy to apply. Gives the lips a refreshing cooling minty feeling. Not sticky, it's creamy. Lips are moisturized and shiny. I noticed a little plumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thick, but not sticky. Love the color and smell

reviews.review_text: I’m not usually a gloss, but this is my exception. It smells great and plumps your lips. The only drawback is that if you apply it a few times a day it can get a little sticky

reviews.review_title: Love it ! Will re-purchase again and again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a one of the first glosses that finished ! And I’ll be buying more and more. I love the shade and the lip plumping. A classic buxom glass.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: great COLOR FOR ALL SEASONS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've come to a phase in life where even creamy lipstick looked a bit too much and most glosses either looked too little or bizarrely shiny.  This stuff hits the sweet spot of colour and shine!  It is a bit sticky, but I forgive it because it is so amazing.  It does tingle a bit, not very much and not for long.  Pleasantly tastes like peppermint.  Product size is quite generous.  Colours are gorgeous.  Stays put and does not travel or bleed.  If you've been on the fence, seriously, try them.  I have both Cherry Flip and Kir Royal.  Both might look a bit daunting, but they are not.    Cherry looks very red on screen, comes out of the tube disappointingly pink and applies in two coats somehow as a clear, clean, apple red, and looks rather natural.  What sorcery is this?  I don't care, tbh.  It's an amazing colour, and as a bonus, my teeth look extra white when I wear it.  I never thought I'd pull off red again - but I can.  Kir Royale looks like you'd be morphing into Goth mode (not that there's anything wrong with that), but it's a lovely clear purple-pink colour.  One coat on me is more pinkish, two coats is a deeper purply-pink with high shine but no brightness to the pink if that makes sense.  It's not like a purple or pink pop! here's my lips kinda of deal.  It still remains very wearable, and you just look nice. Kir also kicks down to a cool neutral when I combine it with a different brand's peachy colour.  Once I run out of that, I will replace with something from this Buxom line because I assume they blend.  Eventually, I will own all of these.  I haven't touched another lip product (except that one blending mode and Buxom's Dolly) since I started Kir Royal.  When I ran out, I added Cherry Flip and I'm SO glad I did.  I won't wait to run out, though.  I want them all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is beautiful but I can’t handle the mintiness of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the tingly creamy feel of this lip gloss. My lips feel hydrated and plump and once applied it lasts for awhile so reapplying is minimal. For $22 for a lip gloss this is definitely a splurge but worth it, I use it almost every day. I can’t wait to try more of the colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing gloss! Not sticky at all and hydrating. The color is perfect for every day use or over a bold lip! Will be my go-to gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's amazing with just the right amount of shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! The perfect nude pink that has a long staying power and moisturizing feeling to it-while still adding some nude pink color to lips. Makes you feel tan and a bit glowy and dewy at the same time! Not goopy at all and looks great with or without a tan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Everyone thought I had gotten fillers!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom will always be my all time favourite lip gloss. I love that it’s got such a cooling sensation. It’s also looks super pretty on. I have White Russian and sugar but blushing margarita is my all time fav

reviews.review_text: I love this formula!! I got a sample size of this and it lasted forever. It’s the first lip gloss that I’ve actually used up and taken the stopper out to be sure I got it all. It’s slightly tingly, not sticky, and a beautiful colour! I am looking forward to trying more colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss! Got it as a gift and I’m hooked. I wear it everywhere. It lasts long and keeps my lips feeling and looking great. I haven’t tried many shades but I don’t think you could go wrong with any. I don’t like things too dark for every day wear, and I’d say this is the perfect color and neutral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love,love buxom plumping lip cream gloss!  I have lines that are like smoker lines. I have been working on them so they have improved some. This plumping gloss really helps!  I can see a huge difference in the lines when I use it. I use it every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give it six stars, I would. This is the gloss that made me fall in love with glosses. For me, I was either always matte lipstick or lip balm, no in between, so glosses weren't always my thing. But for some reason, I decided to pick this up and I am more than glad that I did. It is the absolute perfect everyday shade for me, and I imagine it would be perfect for many other skin tones as well. It's on the thicker side, but isn't uncomfortably gloopy by any means, and it fades gracefully with no white line. It's a gloss, so I wouldn't call it long wearing, but you can feel it on your lips for a couple of hours after application. As for plumping, I didn't notice anything crazy, but that wasn't why I bought it anyway. If your number one priority is a lot of plumping, I don't personally know if this is the best option, but if you're looking for a beautiful shade with maybe a little bit of plumping, definitely check this out. Since purchasing Hot Toddy, I have purchased multiple more shades from this line, but this one is definitely my favorite. If you're looking for a natural, warm pinky brown gloss that won't wash out medium skin tones, I highly recommend trying this one out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Use to only wear Fenty gloss, but I've converted over to Buxom. (I still wear Fenty glosses don't get me wrong). What I love about this is 1. I'm talking to somebody Russian so it's a sign I should buy it, right? 2. It has such a lightweight feel, not gloopy at all! 3. The tint is sooo cute, a light nude which looks good with my everyday makeup. It also has a nice tingly/cool sensation after applying. So glad I could add this amazing product into my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My all-time go to lip gloss. Its the perfect nude that works with all skin tones. Does it stay on yes, but its a gloss so if you are drinking its definitely gonna transfer on to your cup/straw so yes you will need to reapply. I love the slight tingly feel as its a plumping lip gloss but its pretty mild compared to other brands I've used. I always stock up on this and will always purchase the minis as well cause the standard size sometimes is a little too big for my smaller clutches and wallet purses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been testing out different plumping glosses for awhile and this is the winner for me! It isn't overly tingly like the Too Faced version and leaves your lips extra motorized. It has such a gentle plumping agent but I definitely see the results, which stay for hours The White Russian is very light in tint, but works great with promoting your natural color. It's extra creamy and glides on so easily. Definitely going to buy more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It was a great colour. It felt tacky. My lips, teeth, and gums felt cold. Not my favourite. Everyone always boasts about these so I had to try it. I guess the plumping effect isn't really my jam.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Oh how I love a shine!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this gloss. Perfect shine with a hint of a natural toned color. It doesn't try out my lips or cause irritation and I have very sensitive lips.

reviews.review_text: This actually does plump up my skinny little lips a bit with no stinging or major tingling.  Color is great, too!  Comfortable to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

It's quite a thick cream formula, not an easy breezy light gloss, but great for when you really want to take your lips up a notch, but not go as far as a lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have never finished a tube of lip gloss in my life BUT my greedy self got 3 tubes of this is when it was on a weekly wow last year and I have used all 3 of them!!! I LOVE the tingles and minty feel. I will buy this again and again, it moisturizes and is so comfortable. It has saved my lips several times when I’ve tried new lip products and had allergic reactions. I can wear this with no makeup and feel a little bit fancy. I wear it to bed and wake up with plump lips. I have a tube at work and in my purse and in my bathroom. This works better than balms for me when my lips feel dry and chapped. I cannot express enough how much I love this gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had about 3 tubes of White Russian over the years. Especially enjoying the most recent tube. Yes you can find a shiny gloss for much cheaper. But the feel on the lips is perfect and unique.  It’s slightly plumping without the intense tingle and burn some plumping glosses give. It’s cooling and so pleasant. Taste isn’t great if it gets in your mouth but not to bad. White Russian is milky but still gel like enough not to look streaky or gross on the lips. The color is more of a wash and will not look exactly like it does in the bottle on the lips....at least not  for White Russian. decently long lasting for a gloss but will come off with heavy drinking or any eating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color! It's a perfect nude for me (KVD medium 58), but slightly more pink than my natural lip color so it's perfect for Spring and Summer. The formula is comfortable and not gritty. My ONLY complaint that is nearly impossible to prevent is the crusty white edges I get along my inner lip after wearing this for a while. However, that can be simply fixed and happens about 5 hours into wear, so I don't need to touch it up constantly. Almost all lip products give me a crusty line after a while, so I'm not surprised or annoyed at this.

Love the way my lips look with this on, not too sticky that your hair gets stuck in it but glossy enough to reflect enough light to make your lips look juicier than ever. White Russian is the perfect cool toned light pink (if you like Dior 001, nars Turkish delight or mac creme cup)  you HAVE to have this.

reviews.review_title: Perfect gloss for those hot summer days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love these Plumping lip glosses from Buxom. I got the shade Pink Lady and its the cutest subtle doll pink. I tried White Russian as well and I love that shade too, its a perfect light nude thats right in between being pink and peach. I got these initially for my vacation to Mexico for no makeup days by the pool. They do a great job keeping your lips hydrated. The plumping effect feels cool and minty which was perfect cause it kept your lips cold in the hot weather. Don't think they actually plump but the gloss definitely makes them look juicy and brings attention to your lips making them seem bigger. Really do NOT recommend wearing this in the winter time - I did it once and my lips became so cold and a bit numb from the coldness combined with the mint it was an odd experience.

However, if you put like dots (a bit) of it on the lips, may be a little hard to smooth out (pressing the lips tgt), due to the thickish formula. Has a very subtle vanilla scent. Wish they sold the small size on its own and not in sets exclusively (my first one was from set). And now i purchased the full size <3.  I would say the shade is more of a pinky toasty nude.
