reviews.review_text: Fav Fav Fav! This cream gloss is the best product ever. High shine, no tackiness and adds an extra little plump. And remains long wearing, my new go to for all Lippies. Sangria is also the perfect red stain without causing fading!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this lip gloss the day after I had called in sick to work, and then my petty coworkers all started a rumor that I had called in sick to get my lips done so ya you should buy this lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colour and staying power on this product was great but I didn’t find there was much of a ‘plumping effect’ from this. I definitely just buy this as a regular lip gloss. A little sticky feeling but not too bad. Packaging is super pretty and appealing. I keep a couple different colours for daytime wear in my purse to refresh my make up for the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect color for my lips. I love how my lips look. It’s the perfect coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color is perfect and it's so shiny. Really love the minty cool feeling as well. Minus 1 star because I didn't notice any plumping and the color doesn't last very long on my lips. But still overall a great regular gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve restocked this lip gloss five times. If you don’t mind slight tingling on your lips, the colour is beautiful and it lasts a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shine, love the feel, love the colour. It’s the perfect “your lips but better” shade! It’s not too tingly on the lips and feels amazing with 0 stickiness! I saw Chloe Morello rave about this on YouTube... picked it up and it did not disappoint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a few shades of this gloss and its my favorite formula. It doesn't get sticky or stringy. The shades are pigmented, the smell it amazing. The plumping isn't painful or uncomfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love. Buy one in every color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to buy this product like 8 yrs ago in a color called Bambi, then they discontinued that color and my soul died with it. I bought it where ever I could online like a scavenger. But then I eventually decided to let it go and move on. No other colors they made came close. But then I recently thought what the heck I'll give the line another go. So I did, and I'm addicted once again. The color I bought isn't as good as Bambi but it's super close and I get the same just bitten look for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't used plumping glosses since 2005 but tried this after seeing it on a friend. The color is very pretty on both fair and tanned skintones, though I think it pops more on darker tones. It does have a plumping effect- it's not like getting an injection but it will give you a fuller pout. It tingles and is fairly moisturizing without being too sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, nude peach color. Makes lips dewy and love the plumping factor. Buy this in every single color. Soooo nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice, cool minty sensation. Basic lip gloss. Nothing outstanding or plumping about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE IT!!!!!  It doesn't burn as much.... and it plumps very nice.... the color is amazing... will defenatly buy another in other colors and replace this one when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ❤️❤️ this gloss!!  They are my must have items!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss.  I actually like the tingle as it plumps lips.  I did not find it to be too much.  The color is really bare, so I imagine it could be used over other lip stains or sticks. It is not sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color is magnificent!  I love that bit of tingly feeling you get when you put on the gloss that lets you know it's working.  This gloss helps to make my lips appear fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Better than the Maxium Plumper. See my looks on how to achive these lips Great for color mixing with Tarte quick dry matte color EXPOSSED! Dpn't forget The white russian lip plumping liner. The magic is in the BUXOM!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a deluxe makeover in-store today and the Beauty Advisor used Buxom Full-On Plumping Lip Cream Gloss in White Russian. This was a product that I ended up buying after she used it on me! The color is so natural that you can use it over almost any color lipliner and it will take on that pinky tone, or use it alone. I love the way it smells, and my lips tingled for what seemed like an hour after putting it on. Such a winner. I am sure I will be getting other colors soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tingles, so you know it’s working, and it is such a flattering colour. It pairs well with every shade of lipstick I have, perfect for highlighting , Ombre, or on its own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this perfect glossy nude!!  Layered or alone it’s a gorgeous color! It is sticky though-not good for windy days! Plus it has a great minty flavor!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lipgloss! It's not too sticky, wears well, and has a nice tingle to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The prettiest color, shine, and lasting power. I am obsessed with lip glosses, I have a ton in my arsenal but have to say I keep coming back to Buxom - I like both the Cream Gloss and standard high shine. But, Rose Julep is definitely my favorite color! I have gotten numerous girl friends hooked on it too ;)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss! It gives your lips a very natural pout without it being too minty. It’s also the perfect nude and lasts very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice plumping effect and a wide variety of colors which I greatly appreciate. However, it was sticky as most gloss is and that drives me crazy, be prepared to pull your hair off your lips! Ultimately three stars because the taste isn’t the greatest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is just about perfect. It's creamy, not sticky, and has a pleasant tingling sensation. I don't think it has much of a true plumping effect but the shine definitely makes my lips appear fuller. I picked up the LE Peach Daquiri shade, and it's very pretty. not super pigmented, just leaves a sheer peachy shine on the lip that works well on it's own for daytime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a lipstick kind of gal it just looks weird on me so I just always do a nude lipstick so they aren’t bare. Well I’ve been jealous of all my friends and their lipstick so I bought this and wow it is perfect I wish I could wear it just to hang around the house I love it so much and get so many compliments and everyone asks to borrow it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this i got a mini one and then i bought the full size. makes my lips so soft too and look good. will buy again forsure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite plumping lip gloss EVER. The color is perfect and the gloss is good for everyday!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own SO many colors (Dolly is my all time fav, Andrea is my 2nd fav bc that’s my name!) and always keep backups stocked Incase I lose one. Probably have a dozen colors at this point in either the cream gloss or polish gloss. It’s hydrating, not too sticky- great color payoff and staying power! Not sure of it’s plumping power, as I do not really see that. But haven’t found a lippie I love more as of yet! I always keep multiple colors in my handbag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Liked the colour and the flavour, but boy was it tingly! I guess it’s the plumping effect, but I did not enjoy this. It was very distracting. My husband even commented on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love! Love! Love! The way it makes ur lips look is beautiful and it feels very cooling on the lips. I would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rose julep is my favourite colour. I loved the colour so much that I tried to find a lipstick or liquid lip in the same shade. The two faced melted matte in queen b is close.  I love the tingly feeling of the formula and it does plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss!  Perfect color, perfect shine, Perfect plumping!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Cherry Flip! It’s a sheer red color with no sparkle or stickiness and smells like vanilla. It plumps my lips and gives me a nice minty tingly sensation after I put it on. I’ve tried other lip glosses from other brands but, nothing beats Buxom and its Cherry Flip. My favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss feels amazing on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased so many of these buxom lip injection products and love them all. They have a fun tingly/cool feel to them which does plump your lips slightly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite.  I hate everything else I try.  Perfect color and consistency, and it lasts forever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipgloss!! I went through one tube in 3 months and already purchased another. Its a great color and the plumping is noticeable and doesn’t hurt. This gloss is also pretty moisturizing. This is definitely in my top 5 or 3 favorite glosses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was an extremely happy with this lip gloss. I dont normally like lip gloss. This was the perfect shade and lip gloss to go with any lipstick or look. I am going to repurchase this as soon as I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is truly the best lip plumpling gloss ever! it had the perfect amount of tingle but not to the point where your lips are burning, and the colors are gorgeous. it feels very lightweight and creamy and stays on for a very long time. would recommend to all!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss! Have mint or something that to me feels cooling and makes me feel like my lips are plumper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss. The color (Dolly) matches the color of my lips so well, I don't even need a mirror to apply it. I love the tingly feeling. If a lip gloss can be called refreshing, then this one is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss container burst when I opened it and the color wasn't really what I expected. It looked warmer and less pink online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DOLLY IS SO UNDERRATED. It is my FAVORITE lip gloss color, and I love the menthol tingle. It plumps but doesn’t burn or sting, I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am not a huge fan of lip glosses but I decided to give this one a try and I am so glad I did. It is not too shiny and the tingling is refreshing and feels good, not too intense like the du wop imo. The shade is perfect too, nice natural pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my second tube of White Russian after I became hooked on it by using a sample size. Finding a nude color that doesn’t make me look dead/washed out is really tough. I have an olive complexion and this wears well on its own as well as over my lipsticks. The tingling feeling doesn’t bother me and it fades away. The lipgloss also feels moisturizing. I plan on venturing out and trying out more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it doesn’t hurt as much as other plumping glosses do! I also love the tint it adds!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! It's one of the best glosses I've used. it's a little sticky when first applied but once it sits it's pretty comfortable. This color is natural and I use to pretty daily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: white russian is THE BEST color for my skin ( I am fair, blonde) but i know a lot of other people with much different coloring who love this too. i believe it really does plump up your lips and is a nice tingly when you wear that I really do enjoy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perhaps my favorite plumping gloss of the moment. The colors are gorgeous. The consistency isn’t sticky and the gloss glides on smoothly. And yes, it does work as a subtle lip plumper with just a slight tingle, but it would be a great product without that added bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These Buxom Lip Creams revolutionized the way I think about and wear lip gloss. The tingle is ever so slight and is very refreshing unlike other plumbers that simply kill your lips. I really enjoy the effect these guys bring and find myself usually never leaving the house without these even on no makeup days. They do plump a tad bit but I would not expect anything extreme, I do love the fact that they will fill in lines and make your lips look smoother. They also have a great color selection and somehow nailed the best lip gloss formula: not too sticky, not too runny and comfortable on the lips. I love layering these over matte lipsticks that are super drying in order to truly make the colors pop. Ever since I discovered these it has been hard to stay away from them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and the mild tingling that plumps up your lips!

reviews.review_title: best lipgloss! time to stock up for the sale
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip cream is absolutely amazing.  It’s hydrating, smoothing, and plumping.  The color selection is gorgeous.  I have several colors and love them all.  It’s like an amped-up  Mac Lipglass.  In fact, if your lips are on the dry side, this will work better for you than Mac Lipglass.  I have to rub the product in for it to have that plumping effect but, after I rub them in, my dry lips turn into pouty, sexy lips.  It’s magic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was the lip topper for my wedding look! It looked so natural and made my lips look fuller! The color is great for any type of look you want to go for! Bonus: it doesn’t make your lips feel sticky, it feels very moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product and color! It makes your lips look so plump and juicy! I can't get enough of this.  I'll definitely repurchase this again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love so many shades of this gloss. I love the scent and the plumping effect is for real!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip gloss I have ever tried!!! I bought the shade White Russian and when I first received it I thought it was too light for my complexion (NC 30) but now I have to stop myself from using it every single day! It’s super minty flavored which I love and it’s pretty long lasting for a lip gloss. Looking forward to trying new shades from this line!
My fave lip gloss! Been using for a long time. Love love! Friends are also hooked. Natural and classy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ahhhhmazing lip gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just started to use glosses and this one is amazing, I love this colour it's pretty on its own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this lip cream gloss. The Sangria color is really pretty. It's perfect for a nice summertime look. Gives your lips that bit of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with all of buxoms glosses! I love the shade Dolly because it gives a gorgeous colour on the lips. It has an amaxing vanilla scent and I love the cool & tingly feeling on the lips. Does not plump much but the gloss lasts longer than other glosses I have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love these lip glosses! White Russian is an everyday staple. Goes on beautifully and lasts longer than most. Smells good too. (Some glosses can have a plasticky smell.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I have a difficult time finding shades that work with my skin tone, this one is beautiful. It has just the right amount of plumping

reviews.review_title: Really like buxom, but Dolly is not enough color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give it five stars, except the color is just too light.  I was looking for mauve, but Dolly is too sheer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not plumping at all! It just gives a nice cool feeling when applying it, although I do not recommend if you are looking to purchase a lip plumper because this is not it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not sticky, it is very smooth. But it does have a weird taste/smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best lipgloss I ever used. It is kind of sticky for the first few minutes after application. It does give a nice tingly, fresh feeling and the smell is amazing! I personally wouldn't say that it makes my lips bigger though (I have naturally fuller lips). White russian is hands down my fav shade!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample and I was really blown away by it. The color is on the neutral side, so it goes really with my skin tone. The swatch is very minty, so it feels really refreshing all day long. It doesn't gluey and it doesn't bleed. Overall, I'm very pleased with the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this lip gloss. It lasts long, applies smoothly, and has a great chocolate mint scent. You do feel a slight tingling sensation but I didn’t notice my lips getting more plump. My lips are naturally a good size/shape so it’s not a big deal for me. Would 100% recommend and buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is the best lip gloss I have ever worn in my entire life. love the tingly mint it leaves on my lips and this color in particular is super flattering if it is just worn with a mauve lip liner

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This is the best lip gloss I’ve ever tried! It’s minty tingle is so nice, and the color is just stunning! I would recommend to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this makes my lips feel! I already have very full lips, but I do notice a little plumping action. This is perfect for everyday wear with a little natural pop or for casual days. I started out with White Russian for a neutral look, but I definitely plan to try out other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The most amazing lipgloss you will ever purchase! It smells like cotton candy, has a nice tingling feeling and leaves your lips with such a gorgeous shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite colors. It’s perfect with every outfit. And it really plumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is amazing!! It doesn't make your lips feel sticky at all and gives it a little bit of a plump look. This is my go to lip product and I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this lip gloss, it’s nice on the lips, not too tacky or thick. It wears nicely. The only thing I don’t like is the very tingling sensation I get when I put this on. Though I don’t see any plumping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in love with this gloss, I would 100% recommend this to anyone looking for s good lip plumper

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this in White Russian and Sophia and am in love with this product. It plumps your lips and really does make them look fuller.   I find that when I use White Russian it takes me a minute before I like the color. It goes on a little pale for me but once I let it sit and melt into my lips I am in love.   Sophia is just a nice rosy kind of pink.   Both of these colors are great for a more natural, understated (but still VERY pretty) lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pros: 1. Applicator: doe foot, small enough for precise application 2. Formula: MY ABSOLUTE favourite formula. Hoping to eventually collect all of the colours. I struggle with lips products because everything always settles into the lines no matter how much I moisturize my lips (if this is you - give bite beauty lipsticks a try). I’ve decided to start using more lipgloss instead of lipsticks because it being easier to apply. This product is moisturizing but also has the most amazing cooling sensation and I cannot get enough of it. I do find it plumps my lips and gives them the most beautiful shine - not a tacky over glossed look.  3. Packaging - pretty packaging. No leaking or issues in my purse. Fits into acrylic holders nicely   Cons: NONE! I want all of these !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love the color and shine of this one! shade darker and more brown than my own lips and no glitter for a perfect everyday look. love the little tingle and plumping effect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best ever lip gloss! It feels great, lasts long and looks beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Can’t say enough about this lip gloss. It is the absolute best. I’ve tried everything and this is the only one that keeps my lips moistureized but doesn’t feel sticky. I tell all my friends about it. Can’t live life without it!!! It’s that good. Dolly is the best color, like a natural mauve lip color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color Dolly is beautiful! It is definitely that my lips but better color for me. The formula is very shiny and thick, so some may find this formula to be a little too sticky. I didn't notice much plumping, but my lips are naturally already full so others may be able to notice more than I did. This is my go-to for a natural looking shiny lip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipgloss! Goes with most lipliners. Nice minty feel and flavor. One of my favs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. I love the color, shine, and smoothing abilities.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't sure about the color, but I really do like it.  It's a little more on the berry side, but goes well with my brunette hair and on the pale side skin.  One star off for being a little sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic, glasslike shine, very moisturizing, and long lasting. I have this in White Russian, which is a fantastic nude, and it makes my lips slightly lighter in color than they are naturally but the pigment doesn’t settle into fine lines too much like some lighter colored glosses do. Has the perfect balance of sheerness and pigmentation. Not too sticky. I appreciate that it has no shimmer so I can wear it everyday at the office.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a give me some lip set last year and it's been one of my go to lip products. Personally I don't find it plumping at all, but it's hydrating and feels good on your lips. There's a strong sweet smell, but I don't mind it. The Kir Royale shade is really beautiful. Not quite opaque but definitely shows the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Mudslide is my all time favorite. I’m light-medium with a neutral undertone and this is the perfect nude color for me! It’s pretty sheer, and glossy! The color makes my lips looks natural! I recommend this one bar none! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So, I received this over half a year ago as a mini sample thing with an order I bought.   Aaaand then I accidentally through it out... go me.    So I had to buy the full sized version because I just love this.  I love the cooling feeling on my lips.  I don't even like glosses, but this one is just so creamy and not sticky.  It goes perfectly over so many different lipsticks to add just a little something extra or on its on as just a pop of color and shine.   So, I guess its' better I got the full size in the long run.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this gloss.  It's a bit tingly thanks to the plumping action, and the finish is a bit sticky for my liking.  The colour is subtle and flattering though, and the gloss seems to last a pretty long time without needing to be reapplied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Great lip plumper.  I love this lip cream, especially when I put it on over Algenist's liquid collagen.  It burns a little, but it does a good job filling in fine lines in my lips and adding a little bit of volume.

reviews.review_title: You can’t go wrong with these!

reviews.review_text: Recently purchased this product and was immediately in love! I almost always wear matte lip colors so I was nervous stepping out of my usual but it’s my new favorite!

reviews.review_text: I love this product!  It provides sheer color. It easily becomes more opaque with a lip pencil.  Rose Julip is the perfect summer color for me.  I wear rose all the time, which has more red in it. This pink is a nice subtle change for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the tingly feeling. I'm olive skinned, so on me, the color is almost a nude pink. Perfect for the gym or the beach

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am soooo in love!!! I have super dry lips and have been on the hunt for the perfect lip gloss that hydrates as well as that cherry lip color that mimics a red lip tint. This one is it! The color is perfect and I can adjust how intense I want it but it gives you the look like you just sucked on a cherry popsicle. It also doesn't leave a white film residue like a lot other ones do. I would say it stays on for about 3-4 hours but comes off when eating/drinking as expected. I will definitely be repurchasing this color and am looking to buy another color already :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: White Russian is my absolute fav. I love Buxom because their glosses are nice and tacky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually hate glosses but I am addicted to this one!! It looks good with everything and I always get compliments when I wear it

reviews.review_title: love and hate at the same time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product a lot. Looks amazing. Tingle is not harsh at all. What I didn’t love is the drying effect on my lips. When I first got it I wore it everyday. So much so that it cause extreme drying and peeling on my lips. I stopped using it and had to get a steroid cream from the dermatologist to get rid of the peeling. It looked as though my lips were chapped. Literally peeling like crazy. It took about two months to go away. Now I only wear the product on special occasions. I guess I just have skin that’s very sensitive to the tingle chemical. I wish they made this without the tingle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating with a tingly mint feel. It made my lips look flushed and refreshed with a tint of orange-pink that kind of reminds me of a watermelon. The only reason I'm not giving it five stars is the price. It feels more like a $16 lip gloss than a $20 one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite Lipgloss! Loves how it applies

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample and am hooked! I am not usually a lip gloss person (don't like stickyness) but this one is the best I have ever tried. It's not sticky, and it leaves such a fresh finish and taste! I plan to purchase the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Get it ladies! Smells delishl, creamy and smooth ♥️ You just feel sexy putting this on!! The applicator is strong!! (Cuz I hated the glamglow plumpragous). Buxom is amazing  all around :) 24$ is alot but worth it to have a few in your collection!

This particular shade is best used as a topper in my opinion. However, some of the maybes, pinks and purples look great on their own. I don’t think it plumps anything, but I really enjoy the tingle of buxom glosses/lip creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This brand is the best when it comes to lip everything. I love this gloss it is not too sticky and the perfect amount of color. ALSO it is plumping!! I can always feel a tingle whenever I put it on. This is truly the best lip gloss I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect lip gloss!!! It’s not sticky at all, which is awesome, and it gives my lips a plump but natural look! It also feels very refreshing on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best glosses ever! Non-sticky and this formula lasts forever! Will always re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had never heard of this brand, as I'm only now becoming more involved in the makeup world of Sephora, and I received one of these lip cream in my Play by Sephora monthly subscription. I have to say, ever since it's been a trip every couple of weeks to Sephora buying a new color. These products are amazing. They add a touch of color (and some with shimmer) and last a while, too. I have two kids and my 16 month old that has a knack for touching my lips to try to take off my lip color. I will lose the shine eventually, but the color stays for a while longer. I even notice it when I'm taking off my makeup and clean my face with my wipes. I absolutely love the plumping sensation, it's like a minty sensation/flavor. Overall, great product, good price (considering high-end products offer the same for more money), and practical. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this lip cream!! I just love how natural it looks on me, very subtle with a nice shine. Dolly is my favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the plump and the color it brings out. Perfect gloss to tie together a clean day look!!!

I love the tingly feeling and love that the gloss lasts a long time on my lips. I tend to bite my lips if they get dry and chapped so this gloss really helps me refrain from doing that. Cannot say enough good things about this gloss! Love it!

reviews.review_text: I got this in the cutest 100 pt deluxe mini size when I picked up my birthday gift. this color is gorgeous on me and plus I'm not a fan of too much glitter like the lip polish so this provides a nice glassy shine to my lips as well as a great minty refreshing tingle as a plumping effect that also freshens my breath. great to wear over my every day nude pink lipsticks! can't wait to get the full size

reviews.review_title: The sweetest subtle pinky nude I have!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom Full On Lip Cream in “Russian”  Just the other day I redeemed my Beauty Insider points for a sample size bottle of this glossy Buxom lip cream, and it’s already safe to say I will be buying it in full size when I run out. This formula is nicely pigmented and has decent stay power for a gloss, provides a nice cool tingling sensation and pleasantly subtle vanilla scent. The packaging is also quite sweet, I love the frosted glass. The colour is a delightfully pretty pale pink nude, slightly milky and VERY flattering! I struggle to find nudes in this shade that compliment my light skin with pink undertones without washing me out, which is a total bummer since I love the way they look on anyone else. Needless to say I’m delighted that this one looks so good on me! The only thing negative I have to say about this lip cream is that I see little to no difference in the plumpness of my lips while wearing it, and other lip plumpers work well on me. That said, I’m so in love with everything else about this product that I’m fine with just pairing it with one of my other plumpers if I want a pouty look. This is my first Buxom lip colour, and I’m excited to try more when I get the chance. Would recommend!

reviews.review_title: If you love gloss, you need this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My absolute favourite lip product! I don’t see a huge amount of plumping but it does make my lips look a bit fuller and juicy. I love the cooling, tingly sensation and it will definitely be my go-to in the hot summer months. It’s never sticky and for a gloss it lasts super well! I love that it’s not glittery or shimmery, it amazing to put on top of other lip products or wear on its own. All my gloss girls/guys you need this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love this product first time using this brand it makes the lips look bumpin and feels amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite/go to lipgloss, colour looks like my lips yet noticeably and perfectly enhances.... solid plumping effect too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. I'm not a gloss fan except in this case. Dolly is the perfect neutral alone or over a dryer lipstick. Buxom makes my lips look fuller without the sting of other products. It also stays in place much better than other lip creams without being the peel off your lips at night kind. I have many colors including the lipsticks and some of the glosses have a light cinnamon scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Buxom lip glosses, and was able to find a great one to replace an old favorite brand that had been discontinued.  I love all of the Buxom colors I’ve tried, including this one which is the perfect nude/pink for my skin tone.  However, I have sensitive skin/lips and the tingle from the “full-on” line is rather intense.  I recieved this as a sample, and will probably just stick to the regular buxom lip glosses.  I don’t really notice any plumping effect, but I already have rather full lips, so that’s not something I look for anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip gloss ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss with a lot of shine and just the right amount of plump. However the packaging is terrible. It looks good but after a bit of use, the gloss will build up around the lid and it keeps coming out when I close the lip gloss. Its a pretty sticky gloss and it gets everywhere. I'm constantly having to wipe it off and its always getting in my purse where I carry it around. I bought one for my mother and she is having the same problem. I love the product just hate the packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE SO MUCH!!! it's the perfect amount of tingly, but not painful what so ever. The color is subtle but I personally prefer that. VERY quickly became my favorite gloss :)))

reviews.review_title: Best lip product I have ever used!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally would never pay this much for a lip product, but I got a tiny sample of Sephora and just had to purchase the full size!  Totally worth it - this stuff is incredible!  Smells like cake better, slight tingle/mint sensation, just the right hint of color.  I was surprised that it actually does plump my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got White Russian based on Kathleen Lights’ recommendation. Such a pretty nude! It transforms my winter shades to summer shades with just 1 swipe haha. I’m not a big gloss girl but this Buxom gloss is so glossy, shiny, juicy, etc. It plumps up my lips slightly and gives them a fuller, more youthful look, but it hurts way less than the Too Faced one. I’m seriously considering getting a few more shades for this summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have this product in many colors.  I keep one with me at all times.  They are perfect for everyday use or for full makeup days.  I love the minty scent and how well they last on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a dark toned girl and this was the sexiest lip gloss the created a nice natural pout for me , other plumbers I had would make my lips fat but this was the right touch

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this stuff! I naturally have very large lips, but this stuff makes them look so good. It’s long lasting, and the tingling doesn’t hurt at all, honestly. It’s just a cool sensation. It’s also TRULY long-lasting!! Yes Buxom. This is such a good gloss(?). I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dolly is such a great soft neutral/natural tone. Loves the way it plumps my lips too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing - love it - Buxom is the best gloss out there.  I’ve tried them all - this is by far the best brand with the best colour selection, finish, staying power and plumping pow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss. I have the color Bellini and it is a beautiful light peachy-pink color. I have always struggled with dry cracked lips and this product does not accentuate my dryness at all. It makes my loops look amazing, super shiny and glossy and plumped! It doesn’t hurt your lips or sting all day long. The only small downside is that it doesn’t stay on my lips excessively long, but I do lick my lips a lot so I’m sure it’s user error. :) It is very beautiful though and I definitely will continue buying it.

reviews.review_title: Must be the vitamins! Saved my dry, chapped lips!

reviews.review_text: So I’m from Nola and we had an abnormally cold winter this year! My lips were so dry and chapped from the weather. My gf brought me one of these for Christmas. After about an hour of apply this lipgloss on I noticed my lips weren’t dried anymore!!! I purchased like 4 different shades of this lip gloss!

reviews.review_title: Love buxom not completely content with this shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I normally love Buxom lip glosses and I do like this one a lot however the color was not quite what it look like on the display or through the bottle, it's lighter. And for the amount that this one cost I feel like you should easier to define the shades by looking at them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best glosses I ever owned.  Love the tint and the way it feels on my lips.  However, it's plumping so there's that slight sting if you exfoliate your lips right before you put this gloss on.

reviews.review_text: I love White Russian. It looks great alone or layered over nude lipsticks. It is very cooling especially during winter. I just bought this lipgloss in the shade White Russian very nice color not sticky ! Best lipgloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE BUXOM!!! Love this color, the shine, the tingle, the taste. Honestly, any Buxom lip cream (color of my preference has been amazing) <3

The more popular shades are too light or bright for my skin tone. It is described as a toasty nude, which is accurate.  I absolutely love this lippie. The tingle is refreshing and I do think that it has a plumping effect. It's only slightly sticky, but moisturizing and so pretty. What more is there to say about a lip gloss really? It's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lasts long and a flattering shade!

reviews.review_title: One of my fave plumping products.

There’s a good amount in there but because I literally use it everyday I have to repurchase this every other month or so

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect pinky gloss without it being super pink. A peppermint feel but nothing too crazy.

Also, it's not sticky and it's so comfortable. The only downside would be that it wears off somewhat quickly so you do have to reapply often but the tube has a lot of product in it. The color is not that prominent so I would recommend to match the color to your skin tone and the undertones. Overall I definitely recommend this to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been consistently buying this product for the past 3 years! It looks absolutely amazing over a matte lipstick or even just by itself! The only reason I mocked off a star is because I honestly have never seen the plumping effect. I feel the tingle but don’t notice a difference even slightly! Definitely doesn’t stop me from buying it though, still an amazing lipgloss and would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this lip gloss. I read quite a few reviews on it and I was sceptical because most said it was very thick.. which I'm not really a fan of. BUT, this lip gloss is buildable, so you can glide on a sheer coverage, or build it up to a thick gloss. With that being it isn't sticky! which is difficult to find with thicker glosses. I would say there isn't much of a tingle, as it's more of a cool sensation like something minty, it does how ever plump my lips ever so slightly. I only gave this product 4 stars because it didn't do a whole lot of plumping, but I overall really like this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lip creams! I'm just bummed that they got rid of the shade *Hot Toddy* it was the perfect nude. Hopefully they decide to bring it back in the future.

reviews.review_text: The buxom glosses are my HG lipgloss formula - it’s just thick enough to have color, yet not so thick that it clumps and feels heavy. White Russian is a great light pink nude that goes with any look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I own this lip gloss in 2 shades and i will continue to go back for more. They’re amazing!!!!! Not sticky and give your lips a nice shine without having glitter. Best gloss i’ve tried by far.

Super easy to throw in your purse and reapply throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks good, feels great!

These have just a slight tingle when you put them on that I really enjoy(nothing strong, or uncomfortable), and I really enjoy how they feel on my lips.  Next on my list is the shade Dolly.

reviews.review_text: Amazing I love ittttt and the tingle feel. Not sticky or heavy. My holygrail  of lip glosses ♡
