reviews.review_text: I love buxom lip products, and have been using their Full On Lipstick in shade London for almost 4 years. It’s my favorite lipstick product/color and my mom buys it for me all the time for Christmas etc because it’s my go to. So when all the rage became the lip cream specifically in shade “White Russian” I had to get it. It’s overall a nice pink nude lip gloss. I like it by itself or on top of other lipsticks. The only reason I’m not giving five stars is that it’s a very sticky lip gloss and sometimes accumulated in places on my lips after long wear but I would still definitely recommend this product. Also, I love how buxom products almost feel minty and fresh on my lips. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product from the Sephora give me some nude lip set and I love it. I wear it everyday and it’s almost gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with these glosses. You could feel the tingle, which I personally find pleasant. People always ask me what I am wearing, and immediately order Dolly because it is such a staple color to have in your makeup arsenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is the most gorgeous luscious texture. Not sticky at all and very moisturizing. The plumping effect isn’t too strong where it makes your lips hurt. Absolute favorite

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite lip gloss EVER. The formula is perfect because it's not sticky and lasts. This shade is gorgeous and so wearable/versatile. This gloss is for sure a staple in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE Buxom Full-on Lip Creme! I have very dry, peeling lips and this is the only product that completely cures it. I have full lips already but I still notice avplumping effect, probably because my lips have absorbed the cream. I have 7 colors, and Dolly is the most versatile. It’s also probably the closest to natural lip color in fair to medium complexions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product.  Just hate shopping in the location where I live.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love color of White Russian and will continue to buy.  Long lasting application; with a definite tingling in the cold weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this! gives your lips just the right amount of plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula it’s really good. And the colors are amazing. Long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My daughter and I love this item.  It's not lip gloss, but lip CREAM because it goes on smooth and creamy, unlike sticky lip gloss. It is long lasting and has a bit of a tingle that makes our lips oh-so-happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Cannot rave enough about this lip cream. Love the tingle. I have several colors. It is not the same as the lip polish, but I love it also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite gloss! It goes with everything and lasts all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've gone through multiple tubes of this lipgloss. I love that it is very glossy but does not have sparkles in the formula. I can't really tell if it plumps my lips- sometimes I think it does but others not- but either way I love the way it feels. It's a little tingly but not painful at all. Feels kinda good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If it lasted longer I'd give it 5 stars. Love the shade, white Russian. But some of the drug store glosses I have for 1/4 the price of this last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!! I have moscow mule, dolly, and hot toddy all beautiful colours. Not sticky, you feel the plumping. No cons!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got about 10 of these. The colors are good, formula is good. But it leaves a bitter after taste and I just couldn't deal with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: can be a bit sticky and goopy colors and gloss are nice hydrating minty not good staying power love these in the sets over individual since the price is better and you get more colors. One either gets bored or it gets too sticky to use the full size

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this lip gloss! gives a really nice natural colour to my lips and i adore the tingly minty feeling it gives to my lips! i got a mini one as part of my sephora rewards and i am going to buy a full size!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip gloss!! It lasts so long and the color (peach daiquiri) is absolutely beautiful. It’s a nice nude and isn’t so pigmented that it washes me out. It doesn’t burn at all like some other plumping glosses to and provides high shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and got so upset I lost it I had to buy 2 full size ones ! This is the cutest gloss I have and I have A LOT of glosses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Anyone looking for high color payoff, look elsewhere. I purchased this knowing it would be a very sheer, tiny hint of lilac lipgloss, so I'm not mad. I love these Buxom glosses, they tingle and hydrate your lips.  You can even use it as a lip scrub: I usually put one on first thing in the morning, so that it can hydrate my lips while I have breakfast. When I wipe it off with a paper towel I can get the dead skin off, and the slight bit of gloss residue helps whatever lipstick I choose to go on more evenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this paired with Buxom Nudist!! It’s tingly, but not overly, it’s creamy but not sticky, great color and application. It’s a staple now for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like it really does plump. You can feel the tingle, but not in a bad way. It’s super pretty and it smells amazing!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t make your lips plump at all so don’t let the reviews fool you. Just makes your lips feel minty. And the color doesn’t last long at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip product is holy grail status for me. The product is one of the best lip glosses I've tried. It's not too sticky while still maintaining a nice staying power and the scent is nice without being overpowering. This specific color is great for pale redheads; its pale without being chalky. I find it works perfectly over a nude lip liner. Overall I am very satisfied and would recommend this to anyone.

Look no further for the best lip gloss ever. Not only does it plump your lips, it lasts the longest I’ve had a gloss last on me. Also, the shade is amazing for my skin... I went ahead and bought White Russian too since it is a cult favorite... Cannot stress how much I recommend this gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Plumps your lips and keeps them glossy! It’s an amazing product and I️ would recommend it 100% to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample from the Nude Kit.  It is my favorite.  I'm going to be ordering more.   I have terrible dry lips (esp in the winter)

reviews.review_title: Cool tone pink that fits warm tone skins
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yeah... this is the kind of situation that... I tried the mini 100 sephora points reward thing and fell in love with the colour and bough it... I really like the lip cream buxom glosses. I already own Dolly and White Russian, this is my third one. It's a real cool punchy pink but it stills fits great with my fair warm toned skin. Your lips do look fuller with the gloss and you will feel the product activate but it's not uncomfortable. Just don't get it in your mouth...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i have really small lips and always feel insecure without lipstick or lipliner but this tingles just enough to plump my lips where i’m confident to wear it on its own

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like trying different glosses because it is the only thing that I wear but I keep coming back to this one! This is my 3rd bottle of mudslide and I love it, lasts very long on my lips and it is not sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product. I was not really into the glossy lipsticks until I tried these. The pigment is REALLY faint on all the colors I've tried (from the cherry red to the lavender) but I honestly love that. Sometimes I don't want a bold attention stealing red, and I can pair these with any eye look and it will look good. I also enjoy the tingling/menthol-y feeling. That aspect is probably not for everyone, but I like Carmex and it's sort of like a milder version of that in terms of the menthol feel. I want to own every shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great lipgloss!! I wear this to school everyday, it’s an amazing dark pinky color and I highly recommend to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love all buxom lip products/great glossy shine/not greasy/very moisturizing plus a bit of  lip plumping/love the color too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of matte lips, but this definetly has swayed me to go glossy more often. Beautiful shades, not too glossy, and makes your lips feel so wonderful. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down best lip gloss from Sephora 10/10 recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: best kind of plump without cinnamon!!! also finally a white gloss for perfect nude lip

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Can’t get enough of these glosses. Love the tingly/minty feeling it gives your lips. Moscow mike and Kir royal are my go tos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream! Neutral colour, feels great on, not too shiny or too glittery... just wish my hair didn't get stuck in it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing Buxom lip glosses for a very long time and love them!  White Russian is a great nude color.  Not too much pink.  I wear Cotton Candy Pink when I want more color.  I also like Samantha for a beautiful nude.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and formula. Plumps a good amount without hurting or getting comfortable. Favorite lipgloss so far.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: On my third tube! I love this gloss sooo much.

reviews.review_title: Pretty color but not very practical
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sticky and poor lasting power. You need to reapply quite often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: White Russian instantly became my favorite nude lipgloss when it arrived. It smells nice and sweet (like subtle butterscotch) and has a minty tingle. I have a lot of these glosses and can honestly say every single one looks good on me. I have fair skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this line!  this is the 3rd color I've chosen and I love all 3!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying this product.  I absolutely love it.  It’s not super gooey, it’s just the right consistency.  I use it everyday.   It has a tingle to it too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Buxom lip glosses used to be my favorite when I was in middle school and when I saw that these were on sale as the Weekly WOW I couldn't resist. Still tingly and pretty as I remember (although a little too tingly for too long, hence the 1 star off).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love these so much! They tingle but don't hurt like a lot of other plumping glosses, instead they feel slightly cold on the lips and the colors are stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite lipgloss! Love everything about it! My two favourite neutral colours I wear all the time are hot toddy and White Russian.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color is soooo beautiful! I love this product so much I got it in a reward bazar and I went back the next day when they were on sale for $10 completely sold out. I was so sad! But the product has a plumping effect and mkes your lip pop and shine. Extremely natural looking and goes with just about anything! My new fav

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate, HATE thick, gooey, sticky lipgloss. Out of my lipstick obsession, I only own 2 lip glosses. This one is my favorite. I got the clear to go over lipsticks that are more dry and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love all of these lip glosses. I have multiple colors and each one is just so beautiful and glossy! I like that they aren't super pigmented because they make it easier to put over a different lip color. The tingly feeling is also something that I love. Although they are slightly sticky at first, they usually dry down to a more comfortable finish in a couple of minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE the Buxom glosses! They are amazing, not sticky at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great color, doesn't feel sticky like many glosses do, nice tingly sensation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a bunch of these but my favorite is White Russian. Its The one I repurchase over and over! The perfect everyday gloss. Good by itself or layered over a lip stick or pencil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s ok... a little sticky, not long lasting. Will I buy it again ? probably not ...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it will buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it lightens your lips significantly so unless you have extremely pale skin, i don't see this working out. i ended up returning it because, despite having fair skin myself, it was just way too light.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip cream. It's comfortable on my lips, has the perfect amount of shine and lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lipgloss. Goes on smoothly and lasts on your lips longer than most lipglosses. Gives you a tingly feeling, not sure how plump it makes your lips but probably best your gunna get for this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color and the way it feels on! Slight tingle at first, but makes lips feel fresh and not sticky!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip gloss I’ve ever tried. I have the shade white russian and dolly. White russian goes with every look and dolly has a little bit more color the perfect amount not too opaque. The finish is beautiful it really looks like glass. It’s a little sticky but I actually enjoy that. Love these!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gives a beautiful sheen to your lips, buildable color and plumps nicely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff is amazing, perfect nude for my fair skin and makes my lips look amazing. decent lasting time and smells great. for a plumper the sting is bearable unlike the too faced lip injections (which hurts!!!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never met a sheet of buxom lip cream that I didn’t like!  Goes on tingly and lasts a while!  No sticky feel and makes lips pretty and plump! This is my go to gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never met a sheet of buxom lip cream that I didn’t like!  Goes on tingly and lasts a while!  No sticky feel and makes lips pretty and plump! This is my go to gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the gloss I have been looking for. Smells like vanilla, feels super minty on the lips, has great color payoff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lip gloss in the world. It's high shine but not sticky with the perfect amount of pigment. It gives the lips a fuller look and it smells delicious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a point reward sample and I was surprised I actually loved it! My lips looks like stained glass. The plumping effect isn't overwhelming at all. I prefer the lip cream to the lip polish. It gives a very cooling and refreshing feeling on the lips. I purchased two more full sizes after trying the mini!

reviews.review_title: The color was not as I expeccted
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the look and feel of the gloss however the color wasn't what I expected. The picture makes it look more purple or deep berry but it shows up much more red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was never a gloss fan, because many glosses are tacky feeling on the lips and just seem “teenage” like to me. I received a sample of this once, and was HOOKED.  I have it in White Russian, berry blast, and my favourite, rose julep. I love the subtle, minty tingle when you put it on and I love the way it makes my lips look. This fills in every line on my lips, leaving them soft and plump looking. There’s no tacky, sticky feeling to this product, and it doesn’t leave your lips dried out like some other glosses do once you take them off. Definitely plan on continuing to have this in my makeup bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A great colour that would suit many skin tones and the subtle plumping effect is a bonus.   Only gave 4 stars because i have to reapply more often than I’d like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This color is definitely not a rosy nude. It's more of a brown/pink nude and definitely not as bright as shown on the website. It's so perfect!! I love the tingle, and its definitely long wearing (for a lipgloss). Its super shiny and makes your lips look super glossy. It's more of a thick formula so I usually have to dip back in the bottle twice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I hate to be added to the cult... but this is indeed a favorite!  The formulation in general is fantastic (I own several shades) but this shade is perfection!  BUXOM... please never change nor discontinue this lovely lip cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall amazing lip gloss, has an amazing scent, and slight plumping, so it may be a little irritating to the lips. It tingles quite a bit, which I personally like.  Favorite lipgloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: White Russian is a life changing lip cream that you need in your arsenal. I purchased this on a whim after a friend of mine raved about it. I prefer more matte finishes, so I was pleasantly surprised at how much I liked it. Sheer colour, but it’s just right for me as I prefer nude tones :)

reviews.review_title: I was expecting more intense color, but great.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was expecting a more intense pigmentation, but I love it anyway. Feels really great, not sticky and the tingle feels good. Would definitely purchase again now that I know what to expect from the shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good lip gloss! It smells so good and it leaves the perfect shine. I bought the gloss in the color Mudslide and it is the prettiest pale pink! It tingles on your lips and leaves a minty feeling. It has a nice plumping effect and is the best lip topper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: love this product. Yes it is sticky because it is a gloss but duh!!  its supposed to be! it lasts long with that tingling feeling of the lip plumber. the color is nice too!

reviews.review_title: If you don’t have this...you need it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning colour, effect & feel.  A must must must have for everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Rose Julep is a must have!!! The formula is perfect! Glides on effortlessly with wonderful color payoff! It’s not too bright but is the perfect day to night color!! It goes with everything and virtually every eye look! It’s less sticky than the Buxom lip glosses that I have. This is my new go-to. Buy it, you won’t be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used dolly for a few months and like it but it doesn’t  have enough color pay off for my fair skin. French martini is everything I wanted dolly to be. It is a beautiful cool, deep pinkish toned color (hard to explain the shade) that is like my lips but better. The swatch here makes it out as purple but it’s not. It’s stunning! My friend and I both discovered it during the vib sale and are in love!! The color is sheer but I still get color payoff . I love the plumping action of this line also. Will continue buying. French martini is a limited edition color so I emailed the company to see if they would add it as a regular shade. If you love this color you should too! More requests could only help!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip gloss I have ever tried. Non-sticky and hydrating on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love mine! I got it on sale for half off and yes, it's a gloss and you can build it but I wouldn't recommend that just because it's a gloss, although it's not as sticky as you would think. It kind of doesn't have staying power compared to say Kat Von D but it makes me lips feel really cool and cold instead of tingly. Kind of like if you rubbed mint all over your lips. I love love love the color (Kir Royale) It looks very good on me (I'm asian  with pale skin and yellow undertones)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the shade fresh lilac. It was on sale and I love bold colors so I gave it a try. Surprisingly, its not really that bold! This is a gloss, not really a cream like it says. And it just sits on your lips glossy with an ever so slight tint of purple. It is SO lightly pigmented, that I dont think anyone should be scared of how purple it looks in the package, because literally all it does is make your lips have a cool tone rather than warm.  I think it would go fantastic over the top of lipstick. I bet I could pair it with any shade. This is going to be a very easy shade to play with for a variety of looks.  By the way, the plumping works! No irritation. Just a bit of a tingle. I was worried it would dry my lips out because it feels like menthol, but it didnt.   Minus 1 star only because I didnt get what I expected, but I am still happy with what I got!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these lip creams.  They are a nice topper for a more pigmented color.  They are moisturizing without being sticky.  My only issue is,  you have to pile it on  to see any real color to it.  Most of them colors end up looking the same unless you really slosh it on. I wish it had a little more pigment but overall,  I really do like these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like the colour and how creamy it applies. I also love the cooling sensation it leaves on my lips. Is it a great lip plumper? no, I wouldn't say so. Would I recommend It? sure but don't expect miracles

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! I bought the shade Hot Toddy, it’s like my lip but better color. The texture is not sticky. It feels so nice on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In almost any colour, this is my to-go lip cream. I am a big fan of all Buxom lip cream and lip glosses. It feels good and is easily able to blend with most skin colours in my opinion. I encourage anyone to try out this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST lip gloss in the planet. The color is White Russian and it works on any skin tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shade, love the formula. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is that the “tingle” can be pretty intense, and more than that, the tingle seems to last quite awhile. I know it’s a plumper so the tingle is to be expected, but it that feeling lasts a little longer than I’d like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a few buxom lip products and I like them all. I have read reviews about the color White Russian and it seems to sell out quite a bit. I ordered it last week and love it! It is a slight nude but has a hint of a cream color (at least on me). My lips are more of a natural red color so it lightens my lip color nicely. It is so pretty. I completely understand the rave about this color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing lip gloss, smells great, not sticky, beautiful color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss. Love the glassiness of it, and the tingle. I do see a slight, but noticeable, difference in the fullness of my lips after using it. I have the shade Rose Julep, which for some reason isn't available to review. This shade is a beautiful pinky mauve and gives just enough color that I can skip lipstick or liner if need be. I haven't worn gloss regularly in years, but this is for sure the gloss that will change that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lip gloss of all time. It's the perfect amount of sticky and creaminess in a lip gloss. This color has looked good alone and over any lip color I've tried it with. Perfect nude lip gloss for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color! Love the cooling effect it has on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: to the point: i really like this lip gloss ! after the ubiquity of gloss when i was growing up, as an adult i'm not a big gloss fan--i don't always like the wet lip look, as i find it can be messy and unflattering on my rather small lips. but sometimes you just want some juicy, plump, healthy looking smackers ! *particularly* as a refreshing antidote of often rather dehydrated-looking matte lips. these glosses provide an even healthy looking shine, but no shimmer, which i much prefer. it's just sticky enough to bind to the lips and stay, but not so sticky that it's gloopy, thick or uncomfortable. this gloss is not for you if you do not like the feeling of plumping glosses--but i don't find it too strong and certainly do not find it painful--more like the tingling you'd feel if you rubbed a bit of peppermint oil on your lips. i'm excited to spread the word about the loveliness of this gloss. (just to note: it says i'm reviewing white russian when what i actually have 'pink lady', which devastatingly does not appear to be available anymore ? bummed !)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: just based on my first time using it, I doubt I will repurchase this product. While it is pretty, and I love the tingle, it's just not what I was looking for. I'll use it for VERY light makeup days when all I want is some shine, but I just won't be able to use this with full makeup. I tried lining my lips with a neutral shade and putting this all over, but it just bled outside my lips and looked messy. good for what it is- a gloss, but not a great product for me unfortunately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product, especially this shade because it is a simple lip look. Sometimes when I don't want too much on my lips but I still want to put something on them this is what I reach for. I like the peppermint oil that is put into the product to enhance the lips a little more, it is a tingling feeling but I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: White Russian!! I love how this feels

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. The color is beautiful, and I really enjoy the plumping sensation, which doesn't really plump your lips but just feels nice. The only problems I have with it is that the cooling sensation tends to get inside my mouth and not just stay on the lips, and it is not very long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I stocked up during the weekly wow. Love the minty smell and tingling sensation it gives your lips for that plumping effect. Keep in mind the this gloss is more of a light tint, not a full on lipstick coverage. If you’re wanting to try out the formula, get the girlfriend set, lots of different colors in both the cream and the gloss finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: White Russian. Holy grail lip gloss worth the hype. Most favourite lippie for daily use doesn't feel sticky and best of all doesn't leave your lips crusty or flaky after it wears off! And also does not leave that white inner rim. Makes your lips feel cooling but not minty(as if you were outdoors with the cool crisp fall air feeling) If worn alone it does not show up on my pigmented lips but I usually wear it as a lip topper over nude lipstick. Never discontinue this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is less plumping, more I just slathered liquid Altoids all over my lips, isn't the tingling great? (I like plumping products, but I wouldn't categorize this as one of them.)   This gloss isn't any more pigmented, glossy, or smooth than than SPF glosses I get elsewhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect nude and feels nice

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect nude color, looks great alone or topped over lipstick. I love that it is shimmer free, shiny and quite moisturizing. The formula also smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Still a glossy effect. Thick with a creamy color. Tingles! Great for every day or nude toppers. Got this trial sample then immediately bought it. Glad it was on sale!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is my favorite ever. I have this in blushing margarita and white russian. Blushing margarita on me is the perfect MLBB gloss (white russian is a tad pale but still flattering.) I'm East Asian with light-medium warm complexion. The scent is DELICIOUS - like vanilla cake. Very subtle. Glides on and stays put for a long time. The minty sensation is also amazing. Will be picking up more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite brand of lip gloss! Love this stuff!

reviews.review_title: So not worth the price or hype
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in the Sephora nude lip kit and thought I'd like it because it's a lip cream. I absolutely hated it. It isn't creamy at all, it's sticky and feels gross. it also has no color whatsoever. I got Dolly which is supposedly a mauve color but it goes on clear and completely colorless. It didn't last long either. It just disappeared after 20 minutes. I didn't eat, drink or even speak, it just disappeared. The tingle didn't bother me at all in fact I kind of liked the way it felt, that's the only thing I liked about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for a fall, brownish nude to wear over lipstick, but it’s perfect on its own.  Don’t let the dark color scare you away- it’s a sheer color that’s just enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product I use on myself and with clients and it always looks lovely, no matter the skin tone of the person. It has a cooling and minty sensation, so if you don't fancy that this product is not for you. About it being supposedly pumping, I've noticed the lips get slightly more pouty with it. White Russian is a nudy pink, but does not create a white cast inside the lips, as I have seen with other nude glosses from other brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this creamy gloss. It's not sticky, so it doesn't clump up on the lips. It's smooth and feels hydrating for a gloss - and I have very chapped lips. I enjoy the tingly feeling. It doesn't sting, but feels refreshing and minty. The smell is great!! The color is a bit more sheer than what the pictures show, but I don't mind a more sheer tint. Will def repurchase and explore other shades by buxom!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love Love Love Buxom!  The wide variety of shades is perfect for my constantly changing skin tone.  The Lavender Cosmo looks fantastic against my olive skin.  This is one of my favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite go to gloss... I wear this everyday! I have one for my purse and one for my house! This color is the perfect soft nude! It stays on my lips for quite a while it’s not super thick or sticky which I love... when applied it tingles for a second but it’s worth it because it makes my lips look amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loved it so much! so glossy so much plumping!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite everyday lip product. Stays on longer than most,  and always gets compliments.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loved this gloss, it plumps your lips and makes them glossy without being sticky. The shade is gorgeous and it looks wonderful on it’s own or over top of another product!

reviews.review_title: Bit too much of a plumper for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color (Lavender Cosmo) and looked lovely on, but I'm too sensitive to the plumping effect to be able to wear it.  Been awhile since I've worn a plumping lipgloss, so I'm not sure if maybe it's just me or if it really is a bit overwhelming.  If you like that tingly feeling I'd definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite lip gloss! Whenever I wear people always ask, or ask if I got lip fillers lol. I love the texture and smell so Yummy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice lip gloss with a cooling feeling. Makes your lips look plump and glossy without being too sticky. I have the shades White Russian, Dolly and Kir Royale. I wasn't sure about Kir Royale at first but it's nothing like what it seems online it's really a gorgeous deep-wine color, perfect for a glam fall look. Dolly is my favorite shade for an everyday glam makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most amazing lip gloss ever! It's not sticky, it's hydrating, and it's tingly! The color isn't opaque, but it's incredible in every other way. I go through these like water! Would 100% recommend to anyone who doesn't mind the tingling sensation, which I personally love about it! :-)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice pumping lip gloss. Color is not dark , but has a nice shine. Only downfall is that is doesn't last long.

reviews.review_title: Hot Toddy is the go to shade for WOC
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First off, I purchased the color Hot Toddy. It was not listed as a review option. Secondly, this is my go to lip gloss. Great on top of a nude lip and perfect on its own. No white line disater inside of lip. No sticky feeling. Does have a tiingling sensation, since it is a lip plumber. But nothing drastic. I kissed my bf with this on and it surprised him lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: SLIGHT TINGLING UPON INITIAL APPLICATION, NOT THE RESULTS THAT I EXPECTED, I WILL NOT PURCHASE AGAIN

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So cute & I did find it to be plumping but it’s also REALLY sticky and smudgy. 100% transferable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know what’s in these formulas but I LOVVVE IT!! Such a sheen and I know that White Russian isn’t the best color to show off the true effect of the plump but it’s my favorite over some chapstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously my favorite lipgloss ever. I bought it because Jaclyn Hill was raving about how good it was. SHE. DID. NOT. LIE. This lipgloss is AMAZING. It feels so good on your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this formula and shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My most favourite lip product of all time. White Russian looks good alone, over a liquid lip, lipstick or just a lip liner! Can't go wrong with this shade, very complimentary with its nudey pink colour. The gloss it not too stinky and gloppy, just the right texture. I also love the fresh minty tingle and smell that it has.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE.  Beautiful color, long lasting, smells good and the tingle lasts a long time.  Not sticky, goes on smooth and glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's hard for me to find a lip product that doesn't cause my lips to peel or dry out, but I use this lip gloss to condition my lips in a pinch, it's that moisturizing. The sheer tint of this lip gloss is accompanied by brilliant shine which is so flattering. While I find the lip gloss to be a little tacky, I don't mind that because the wear time is above average for a gloss. I highly recommend this gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium full lips. wanted something to make them look a little full, I like them tingly feeling the lip cream gave but I didn’t really see an effect. I also thought the color would be a light see through but it was more of a creamy texture. It was ok but I wouldn’t buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so awesome. I first tried it when it was included in the Sephora Give some Nude Lip collection and have been hooked ever since. I wasn't expecting much, but the moment I put it on I exclaimed OMG! I love this!! The smooth texture, the delightful cool tingly feeling, the addictive taste and smell, and the glorious shine. On it's own it is lovely, but it also has the power to transform every lipstick you own into something special. Not sure how much plumping happens, but I get compliments every time I wear it (which has pretty much become every day.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buxom Full-On Lip Cream is hands down the best out there. I have purchased multiple shades and have been very happy with them all. Color and gloss lasts well into the day when I apply in the morning. Will be buying many more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got White Russian and it tingled a lot the first time I wore it but after that it just feels like a slight minty tingle. I love how this looks on your lips and how long lasting it is compared to previous lip glosses I've owned. It hydrates your lips more than I was expecting and keeps my lips from getting chapped in the cold weather. I love it! Will definitely be purchasing again when I run out. If it burns a lot the first time give it another chance, I almost returned it but I'm so so glad I didn't because it turned out to be a lovely product. Only thing is next time I think I'll get a slightly darker color than White Russian because it did make my face look a bit washed out. Also it's great because it doesn't get super sticky!!! Even as it slowly wears down on your lips throughout the day it doesn't get sticky like soo many other lip products I've owned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After all the reviews,Thought was good,wasn't made my lips look chapped/dry!!for the price Isn't worth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells good & feels like tingly on my lips... like lip plumper. Very light color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always loved Buxom. Can't go wrong in my opinion.

reviews.review_title: I’m in love with the White Russian color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color!!! It’s beautiful on :) it plumps my lip up so sexy and I love the nude/Pink color!!!
I really like this product. Has a really nice sheen, no glitter. Can be worn on its own or over a lipstick. Only con is that it can accentuate dry lips and cling to the bad parts.
Best lip gloss I've ever had hands down. Super pretty natural light pink lip colour and bombing shine, 10/10 would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip cream! Amazing gloss finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this...color and finish is beautiful but did not like the sticky feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you put it directly on your lip, it is a waste. Put it on your lip as a layer and turn your spring and summer lip to a autumn and winter shade. Put it on your orange and red lip. This product will give you a gorgeous purple and brown color. So you do not have to buy another lipstick for autumn and winter. (But I know you will.)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have both the colors Moscow Mule and Cherry Flip. Now as a woman with already full lips I can not say for certain that the plumping aspect of this gloss actually works. However, I can say that what I like about this gloss is that long after the shine has dulled down my lips still feel soft and moisturized. For that very reason I would recommend this gloss. If you can get past the slight tingling feeling from the plumping agent then I think that you will really like this gloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Now, when I made this purchase I thought I was buying a lip gloss without the tingling, lip plumping effect. I am usually not a fan. Although I am not fond of the first few minutes, I am able to tolerate because once it wears off I simply love the way this looks! It's one of my favorite lip colors.

reviews.review_title: Love it love it love it
reviews.review_text: Love this nearly opaque shade! It smells like marshmallows and/or vanilla. The tingly on the lips is an odd sensation at first, but it's nice and cooling! The colour is a wonderful colour, love everything about this.

reviews.review_title: You can't go wrong with this beauty and here's why
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Chose this lip cream as a sampler with some of my sephora points. I am more of a tinted gloss kinda gal. I didn't really know what to expect although I originally picked it for its color, only to find when it arrived, TO BE MY NEWEST FAVORITE GLOSS... AND IT SMELLS AMAZING!!!!  I did my make up application roughly 3  hours ago and it is still on my lips. I have kissed my baby (it is transferable but minimal), I have eaten a snack, brushed my teeth and drank water. Still on... not in its original application but pretty darn close. When you apply it, it has a profressional look to it. Certainly doesn't look like a cheap gloss, also has a subtle tingly feeling and smells amazing!!!!   Would recommend for sure, especially if you prefer gloss over lipsticks!
Love this so much! It doesn't plump but it feels amazing and leaves such a nice shine on the lips. It also saves my lips so many times when they are so dry and chapped.
not too dark, but a pretty tint.

I never wear anything on my lips although I do like clear lip gloss (I used to love the lip smackers!) I tried this and LOVED IT. Not only that but I have small lips so when I found out it was a lip plumper almost I was excited. Did give my lips a little bit of volume just because of the minty flavor. I absolutely love this product though, I will never go without it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lipgloss. I have gotten it in 4 colors now. It's not sticky, leaves really nice, even color, and stays on for a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: best. lip gloss. ever. tingle is great, perfectly tacky. and the COLOR.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty color and keeps the lips soft.
